productPageReviews.reviewDescription: This is my very first Apple device, my initial thoughts are:I am very impressed by the hardware of this device. Specifically:- A quick CPU benchmark placed this at around 90% of my desktops performance (Ryzen 9 9800X3D). For a laptop, that is absolutely unheard of.- The battery seems to last forever, even with semi-intensive workloads. At one point I used it for an hour and still had 97% battery.- The display is incredible. The contrast, resolution, and refresh rate combined make this about the best I've seen.- The webcam is high quality.- The MagSafe charger is very niceIn general, Macs don't support as much software as Windows. In my case, it does support everything I would need a laptop for, but it is something to keep in mind.However, because Apple has their own OS, hardware, etc, the software experience is far more tailored to the device than Windows devices are. As an example, the webcam settings are very easy to use and access.The device itself is very light and thin, it was a little smaller than I expected, ordering the 14 inch one, but I don't have any issues with it.In conclusion: This is a premium laptop, for a premium price - designed with ease of use and workloads in mind.
productPageReviews.reviewedIn: Reviewed in the United States on May 12, 2025

productPageReviews.reviewTitle: ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️☆ Powerful, Sleek, and Fast — But the Black Finish Needs Care
productPageReviews.reviewDescription: The MacBook Pro M4 14-inch is hands-down one of the fastest, smoothest laptops I’ve ever used. Everything from boot-up to heavy multitasking is incredibly quick and responsive. Apps launch instantly, video editing is seamless, and battery life is excellent — I can go a full day without needing to plug in.The screen is gorgeous, speakers are rich and clear, and the keyboard/trackpad combo is still the best in the game. It feels like a true professional machine in a compact body.✅ What I Love:• Blazing fast performance with the new M4 chip• Beautiful 14” Liquid Retina XDR display• Long-lasting battery• Solid build quality — feels premium and sturdy• Quiet and cool under load⚠️ Minor Concern:I went with the black (Space Black) finish, which looks amazing out of the box — but it picks up fingerprints and smudges easily. Even with clean hands, I find myself constantly wiping it down to keep it looking clean. It doesn’t affect performance at all, but something to be aware of if you’re picky about aesthetics.⸻💬 Final Verdict:If you want a powerful, premium laptop for work, creativity, or everyday use, the MacBook Pro M4 14” is an absolute beast. Just be ready to give the black finish a little extra care — or consider using a case or skin if that kind of thing bothers you.
productPageReviews.reviewedIn: Reviewed in the United States on July 26, 2025
productPageReviews.variant: Style: Apple M4 chip, Capacity: 16GB Unified Memory, 512GB SSD Storage, Color: Space Black, Set: without AppleCare+

productPageReviews.reviewTitle: The Best Mac for Developers Yet
productPageReviews.reviewDescription: As a developer, performance, reliability, and efficiency are non-negotiable. After upgrading to the MacBook Pro with the M4 chip, I can confidently say: this is the best Mac you can get if you're a developer like me.The jump in speed is noticeable across the board. Whether I'm compiling large projects, running Docker containers, or juggling multiple VS Code windows with Chrome, Postman, and the terminal—everything feels faster and smoother. Thermal management is excellent, meaning I can work in silence without the fans kicking in or the machine heating up under pressure.Battery life is another huge win. I can go through a full workday on a single charge, even with my usual heavy dev workflow.If you're in the Apple ecosystem and you're serious about development—whether it's web, mobile, backend, or even AI/ML—the M4 MacBook Pro is an investment that pays off immediately in productivity and peace of mind.
productPageReviews.reviewedIn: Reviewed in the United States on August 4, 2025
productPageReviews.variant: Style: Apple M4 chip, Capacity: 16GB Unified Memory, 512GB SSD Storage, Color: Space Black, Set: without AppleCare+

productPageReviews.reviewTitle: Longest lasting battery I’ve ever seen in a laptop
productPageReviews.reviewDescription: Very fast laptop, very long battery life. For the graphically interesting games natively compatible with it, very good graphics performance. The display is amazing and is capable of twice as many pixels as it shows you. It was a good value in a Black Friday sale (~$1400), but this (M4 Pro 12/16) chip is on par with or under performance of the prior generation M3 Max 14”, so if it can get one of those for a good deal refurbished or open box, there is no shame in it. As with all M1/2/3/4s, there are dedicated neural cores for Apple Intelligence to run, which allows for a personalized Siri who listens to you and watches you all the time, without sharing this information. You can disable Apple Intelligence and Siri, but after I got past the creepiness, I configured Siri as an Irish Female, and it makes everything lovely. There is a lot of integration with other Apple devices, like you can operate your iphone from a distance on your MacBook. You can also receive texts and Messages from your iPhone, and easily use it for tethering, as a substitute for your webcam (the webcam is pretty solid nonetheless). This model supports linking hearing aids and also supports airpods much in the same way the iPhone does. You can easily use your living room TV as a second monitor on the fly, and if you can plug in via HDMI, you can get the whole 4K@120hz. MacOSX is a great operating system, built on Unix, and with tons of room for customization for beginners to super users. Time Machine backups with your own plug-in hard drives and iCloud are incredibly convenient. Safari gets better and better, but the Mac versions of Chromium and Firefox also dazzle.For most programs that aren’t games, macOSX is widely supported, but if you just *need* it, parallels desktop and vmware can run windows for you.New users ought to pay close attention to Tips and go into settings and learn all the trackpad gestures. You won’t want to come back to a different trackpad, and until you want to game, you will not care to use a mouse.Anyway, I got this for my wife as a gift, partly because she needed a new computer and partly because I wanted to convert her. She seems pretty converted.
productPageReviews.reviewedIn: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2025
productPageReviews.variant: Style: Apple M4 Pro chip, Capacity: 24GB Unified Memory, 512GB SSD Storage, Color: Space Black, Set: without AppleCare+

productPageReviewsFromOtherCountries.reviewDescription:
The media could not be loaded.
                
            
                
            
            
        
    
    








  
  
    Let’s get one thing straight: the MacBook Pro M4 14” isn’t just a laptop — it’s a statement. From the moment you crack open that iconic box, you’re hit with the kind of premium experience that feels less like unboxing a computer and more like peeling back the cover on a brand-new luxury car. It’s clean. It’s precise. It’s next level.💻 Design & BuildSleek doesn’t even begin to describe it. Apple has mastered minimalism, and this machine is proof. Every inch of the M4 MacBook Pro screams modern sophistication. It’s compact without feeling fragile, with a chassis that feels rock-solid in your hands. You’ll know right away this isn’t a device that compromises.🔊 Audio That Hits DifferentLet’s talk sound — because wow. This isn’t your average tinny laptop audio. The MacBook Pro M4 delivers full, rich, immersive sound that surrounds you like a personal concert hall. Whether you’re streaming, editing, or just zoning out to your favorite playlist, the audio quality alone sets this machine in a class of its own.⚡ PerformanceUnder the hood, the M4 chip goes to work. Everything runs smooth as silk — apps launch instantly, multitasking is a breeze, and even the heaviest workflows barely make it break a sweat. It’s not just fast. It’s scary fast. This is a true powerhouse for creatives, professionals, and anyone who refuses to wait on a loading bar.🖱️ Trackpad & ExperienceThe trackpad? Possibly the best in the business. Responsive, comfortable, and intuitive. It’s one of those things you don’t realize is important until you use it — and then you never want to go back. The entire user experience feels like it was built to anticipate your needs before you even know them.📷 CameraThe camera is chef’s kiss. Crisp, clear, and perfect for video calls or content creation. It’s what you expect from Apple, and they delivered.🍏 Switching from Windows? Read This.If you’re new to Mac, be ready for a shift — but don’t worry, it’s a good one. MacOS is a different ecosystem, and yes, there’s a learning curve. But once you get the hang of it, everything just makes sense. The layout, the shortcuts, the accessibility — it’s like discovering a better way to compute.⸻⭐ Final VerdictOwning a MacBook Pro M4 14” is more than having a computer — it’s joining a legacy of excellence. It’s beautiful, bold, and built to perform. Whether you’re a die-hard Apple fan or a curious Windows convert, this machine delivers an unforgettable experience from the first click to the last.5/5 stars. Worth every penny.

productPageReviewsFromOtherCountries.reviewTitle: After using windows and linux for more than 10 years, I decided to switch to Mac.
productPageReviewsFromOtherCountries.reviewDescription: It's hands down one of the best decisions I've ever made. The performance jump is noticeable right away: multitasking is smoother than ever, and even heavy workloads like coding, light machine learning, and video editing feel effortless.The biggest surprise is how cool and quiet it stays.AND battery life is incredible: I can go a full workday with plenty left, even with multiple tabs, meetings, and background apps running.

features: SPEED OF LIGHTNESS — MacBook Air with the M4 chip lets you blaze through work and play. With Apple Intelligence,* up to 18 hours of battery life,* and an incredibly portable design, you can take on anything, anywhere.
SUPERCHARGED BY M4 — The Apple M4 chip brings even more speed and fluidity to everything you do, like working between multiple apps, editing videos, or playing graphically demanding games.

BUILT FOR APPLE INTELLIGENCE — Apple Intelligence is the personal intelligence system that helps you write, express yourself, and get things done effortlessly. With groundbreaking privacy protections, it gives you peace of mind that no one else can access your data — not even Apple.*
UP TO 18 HOURS OF BATTERY LIFE — MacBook Air delivers the same incredible performance whether it’s running on battery or plugged in.*
A BRILLIANT DISPLAY — The 15.3-inch Liquid Retina display supports 1 billion colors.* Photos and videos pop with rich contrast and sharp detail, and text appears supercrisp.
LOOK AND SOUND YOUR BEST — Everything looks and sounds amazing with a 12MP Center Stage camera, three mics, and six speakers with Spatial Audio.
CONNECT IT ALL — MacBook Air features two Thunderbolt 4 ports, a MagSafe charging port, a headphone jack, Wi-Fi 6E,* and Bluetooth 5.3. And it supports up to two external displays.
APPS FLY IN MACOS — All your favorites run lightning fast in macOS, including Microsoft 365 Copilot, Adobe Creative Cloud, and Google Workspace.*

IF YOU LOVE IPHONE, YOU’LL LOVE MAC — Mac works like magic with your other Apple devices. View and control what’s on your iPhone from your Mac with iPhone Mirroring.* Copy something on iPhone and paste it on Mac. Send texts with Messages from your Mac, or use your Mac to answer FaceTime calls.*
* LEGAL DISCLAIMERS — This is a summary of the main product features. See below to learn more.

productPageReviews.reviewTitle: Apple 2025 MacBook Air 15-inch with the M4 chip
productPageReviews.reviewDescription: Based on the details you provided, here is a draft of a review you can use:A Fantastic Renewed MacBook Air — A True 10/10I wanted to wait a few weeks before writing this review, and I'm so glad I did. The renewed Apple 2025 MacBook Air 15-inch with the M4 chip has been an absolutely phenomenal purchase. The first thing I did was call Amazon to verify the renewal process. The team member I spoke with confirmed that these units are refurbished by Apple, which handles all inspections, part replacements, and quality checks. They pay close attention to cosmetics and put a heavy emphasis on battery life, ensuring every unit meets Apple's high standards.When my MacBook Air arrived, it was in the original packaging, just as the pictures I took show. I was amazed by its condition. The only sign of previous use is an extremely light wear mark on the lower left side of the trackpad, suggesting the last owner was left-handed. The battery came with a full 100% charge and 100% health, which is incredible for a renewed device.This machine is light-years ahead of my old 10-year-old MacBook Air. The M4 chip makes it exceptionally fast, and the 15.3-inch Liquid Retina Display is stunning. Given the amazing quality and performance, especially with upcoming tariffs in mind, I would give this unit at least a 10-star rating if I could. I am completely satisfied with this purchase and would highly recommend it to anyone.

productPageReviews.reviewTitle: Outstanding all-around laptop — sleek, powerful, and efficient
productPageReviews.reviewDescription: The MacBook Air M4 15-inch is simply fantastic. From the moment I started using it, I was impressed by its blazing-fast performance — the M4 chip handles everything smoothly, from multitasking to editing and coding. The 15-inch display is gorgeous: bright, sharp, and vibrant, perfect for both work and entertainment.Despite its larger screen, the laptop remains incredibly thin and lightweight, making it super portable. Battery life is also amazing — I easily get a full day’s use without needing to charge. The fanless design means it runs silently even under heavy use.Combined with macOS’s stability and Apple’s build quality, this is the best balance of power, portability, and value I’ve seen in a laptop. Highly recommended for students, professionals, or anyone who wants a reliable and elegant machine.

productPageReviews.reviewDescription: The 2025 MacBook Pro has exceeded expectations in every way. Its performance is remarkably fast, efficient, and reliable, making it an excellent tool for both productivity and creative work. The setup process was seamless, and the overall design and functionality reflect Apple’s usual attention to detail. While my initial order was delayed due to an unexpected Amazon cancellation, the product itself has been nothing short of outstanding once received.

productPageReviews.reviewDescription: I tried a small desktop Mac years ago and was not particularly pleased with it, but I’m glad I gave them a second chance. I have a great desktop PC computer that I love with dual monitors and it does everything I need but using this for graphic design and photo editing it has been amazing. I did get the 24 gig model with the 512 hard drive and I love it, but I am positive you could’ve got less and did the same. The screen is vibrant and crystal clear, using Adobe Lightroom on here is actually pretty amazing. The one thing I like about the Apple version of a laptop is that it never even hiccups, it never slows down, it never hesitates and it is completely quiet because there are no fans. I would highly recommend this to anybody, it’s a definite win.

title: 15.6" Laptop-Computer with N5095 (4C/4T, Up to 2.9GHz), 16GB RAM 512GB SSD (Up to 2TB), Win11 Pro, Backlit, Fingerprint, Type-C, HDMI, USB3.2, BT5, WiFi 5, Laptops
inStockText: In Stock
breadCrumbs: Electronics > Computers & Accessories > Computers & Tablets > Laptops > Traditional Laptops
features: Powerful Performance Core: The 15.6" Laptop Computer is powered by the Celeron Processor N5095. With 4 Cores and 4 Threads, it has a base frequency of 2.00 GHz and a pulse frequency up to 2.90 GHz, along with 4 MB L3 Cache and 15W TDP. This reliable processor ensures smooth operation whether you're handling daily office tasks, multitasking between different applications, or engaging in light multimedia activities, allowing you to work and play with ease.

Adequate Storage Solutions: Laptop with 16GB LPDDR4 RAM and 512GB M.2 NVMe SSD, it offers sufficient space for storing your essential files, apps, and media. The large-capacity storage provides ample space for your extensive work documents, media libraries, and various applications. And with the option to expand the storage up to 2TB, you'll never have to worry about running out of space. The high - speed read and write performance boosts your productivity, making file transfers and program launches a breeze.

Bring Stunning Visuals: Laptop have 15.6-inch FHD IPS displays. These displays have wide viewing angles and clear, vivid images. This makes for a stunning visual experience. Every frame is colorful and detailed. This makes watching movies, editing photos, or playing games more enjoyable and comfortable. It's like having your own personal movie theater or art gallery. These laptops bring your digital world to life.

Convenient User Experience: The backlit keyboard enables comfortable typing even in dimly lit environments. Each key is clearly illuminated, allowing you to work or play without fumbling in the dark. The advanced fingerprint sensor provides an extra layer of security, quickly and accurately recognizing your fingerprint for instant device unlocking. It not only protects your personal data but also saves you the hassle of typing in passwords.

Rich Expansion Interface: This laptop comes with a comprehensive set of interfaces. It includes 0.3MP camera for video calls, USB3.2 Gen 1 TYPE - A *1 (5Gbps/S), USB2.0 *1 for data transfer, HDMI 1.4 *1 for external display connection, 3.5mm CTIA Audio Interface *1, TYPE - C PD Charging Port *1, Extended TF Card Slot *1, Kensington Lock Slot *1. With Wi - Fi 5 and Bluetooth 5.0 technology, you can enjoy stable network connections and seamless pairing with other devices.

sustainabilityFeatures.title: Energy efficiency
sustainabilityFeatures.description: Conserves energy compared to similar products.

certifiedBy.name: EPEAT
certifiedBy.description: EPEAT certifies electronic products based on sustainability impacts across their life cycle including requirements for energy efficiency and end-of-life management. An EPEAT registered product can also meet optional more ambitious criteria including reduction of fluorinated greenhouse gases (F-GHGs). Products meeting 50% - 74% optional criteria are 'Silver' and those meeting 75% or more are 'Gold'.Learn more about this certification

features: SPEED OF LIGHTNESS — MacBook Air with the M4 chip lets you blaze through work and play. With Apple Intelligence,* up to 18 hours of battery life,* and an incredibly portable design, you can take on anything, anywhere.
SUPERCHARGED BY M4 — The Apple M4 chip brings even more speed and fluidity to everything you do, like working between multiple apps, editing videos, or playing graphically demanding games.

BUILT FOR APPLE INTELLIGENCE — Apple Intelligence is the personal intelligence system that helps you write, express yourself, and get things done effortlessly. With groundbreaking privacy protections, it gives you peace of mind that no one else can access your data — not even Apple.*
UP TO 18 HOURS OF BATTERY LIFE — MacBook Air delivers the same incredible performance whether it’s running on battery or plugged in.*
A BRILLIANT DISPLAY — The 13.6-inch Liquid Retina display supports 1 billion colors.* Photos and videos pop with rich contrast and sharp detail, and text appears supercrisp.
LOOK AND SOUND YOUR BEST — Everything looks and sounds amazing with a 12MP Center Stage camera, three mics, and four speakers with Spatial Audio.
CONNECT IT ALL — MacBook Air features two Thunderbolt 4 ports, a MagSafe charging port, a headphone jack, Wi-Fi 6E,* and Bluetooth 5.3. And it supports up to two external displays.
APPS FLY IN MACOS — All your favorites run lightning fast in macOS, including Microsoft 365 Copilot, Adobe Creative Cloud, and Google Workspace.*

IF YOU LOVE IPHONE, YOU’LL LOVE MAC — Mac works like magic with your other Apple devices. View and control what’s on your iPhone from your Mac with iPhone Mirroring.* Copy something on iPhone and paste it on Mac. Send texts with Messages from your Mac, or use your Mac to answer FaceTime calls.*
* LEGAL DISCLAIMERS — This is a summary of the main product features. See below to learn more.

productPageReviews.reviewTitle: Incredible for the price, beautiful display, amazing keyboard
productPageReviews.reviewDescription: It's snappy, has a great screen, and all day battery. As a student, I needed something portable I can attend lectures and meetings with all day long and this computer delivers in spades. I'm formerly a Windows and Linux user, so trying a MacBook was a leap of faith for me. Glad I did it... it has made my student life significantly easier. It's the perfect size and nice an light. Beautifully designed but not at the cost of function. The Keyboard and Screen are perfect.It will run basic games no problem, but I wouldn't throw any AAA games at it.
productPageReviews.reviewedIn: Reviewed in the United States on October 8, 2025
productPageReviews.variant: Capacity: 16GB Unified Memory, 256GB SSD Storage, Color: Midnight, Set: Without AppleCare+

productPageReviews.reviewTitle: Great Basic Computer that offers so much more.
productPageReviews.reviewDescription: Great laptop.  Fast, sleek, great operating system.  Needed a basic laptop for average needs.  Debated about getting the ipad with a magic keyboard vs MacBook Air.  The laptop is a far better value.  Real computer, real keyboard,  real operating system and long battery.  If you need a basic computer this is it and so much  more.  If you want something to craze social media get an Ipad.  But I just find this a much better value than an Ipad.  Again you need to assess your needs vs features vs value. If this had a touchscreen I would have not even considered the Ipad.  Face it.  Macbooks are expensive but they hold out a lot better than the other options.  If you are a creative professional you have alot of options when considering RAM and storage options.  But for writing and basic photo editing this is a perfect machine.
productPageReviews.reviewedIn: Reviewed in the United States on September 6, 2025
productPageReviews.variant: Capacity: 16GB Unified Memory, 256GB SSD Storage, Color: Midnight, Set: Without AppleCare+

productPageReviews.reviewDescription: I would not consider myself an Apple fanboy by any means, but I was looking for a laptop for video editing and general everyday use and this one is perfect for me.It’s paper slim, super light and portable. It’s pretty powerful for what it is, although don’t expect it to run any demanding games at 60+ fps all the time. Since there’s no fan, it uses a passive cooling system by throttling the performance of the laptop as it heats up. So overall not the best option for gaming ( along with the limited library of games available on Mac OS ), although a plus side to having no fan is that there’s no noise.For general use, ( surfing web, watching videos, editing, etc ) It’s great. Runs nice and smoothe. Picture quality is good. The interface of Mac OS is super intuitive. It’s super easy to transfer files between devicesSo far the only thing I despise is the limited ports on the side of the laptop. You have a port for the charging cable, 2 USB-C ports, and a headphone jack, that’s it. This could be fixed by getting a dongle to plug in so you could plug in USB devices and HDMI cables.Overall, i’m happy with it so far. I’m sure this thing will last for a loong time so I think it’s worth it even if it’s pricey.
productPageReviews.reviewedIn: Reviewed in the United States on July 25, 2025
productPageReviews.variant: Capacity: 16GB Unified Memory, 256GB SSD Storage, Color: Midnight, Set: Without AppleCare+

productPageReviews.reviewDescription: I had a 2014 Macbook Pro and although it still worked great was no longer getting updates. I also wanted to get a Mac that had the M processors but had decided that I wouldn't go with a big screen like last time. I wanted something relatively light. I also wasn't going to spend as much money as last time either. The Macbook Air M4 fit the bill perfectly. I'm using it now for this review. I bought it for $1,049 and I see it's cheaper now but I still have no regrets.Pros:1) This thing is fast! I had built my latest PC with the best components and I'm still finding myself docking this and using it instead2) All of the creative software just seems to work better on this Mac.3) This is the perfect size for portability. I was a little concerned that the screen might be too small given my eyesight but it wasn't a problem. Screen quality is good and I have no issues there.4) Battery life is very good. I'm usually not doing anything power-intensive when I'm just using it as a laptop but I can generally go about a day periodically using it and not have any issues.5) The keyboard is great - not too crowded and the backlighting is good.6) Finally, the base model has 16GB instead of 8GB. I don't know why Apple insisted that 8GB was enough in 2025 - memory is pretty cheap and 16GB is pretty much the minimal you need now a days.Cons1) This is true for all modern macbooks, but you have to absolutely get what you need when you buy it. It's not upgradeable. You can do some things like get a thuderbolt 4/5 ssd enclosure for storage but you have to nail down the amount of RAM you want. However, as I mentioned above the default RAM is 16 GB and that's good enough for most people.2) The magsafe connector is great but it does seem to come off a little too easily. It's a minor gripe at best.Overall just a great laptop - I'm very happy with it.
productPageReviews.reviewedIn: Reviewed in the United States on August 10, 2025
productPageReviews.variant: Capacity: 16GB Unified Memory, 512GB SSD Storage, Color: Midnight, Set: Without AppleCare+

productPageReviews.reviewDescription: I normally don't write reviews but I think it's very important to note how amazing this laptop really is. I think it is quite pricey but it is an Apple product so you can expect that. I have never owned something that feels so durable and that can actually just perform tasks straight out of the box. I am a college student and do audio production as a hobby and this thing does both very very well. If you are currently using Windows, it takes a little bit to get used to but it's worth it. GarageBand is also pretty dope. Well done, Apple.

productPageReviews.reviewDescription: Switching to Mac might be the best decision I have made , it’s a an over kill in ability and processing for the price and I love just how compatible it is with my phone and all the things it allowed me to do that i couldn’t with intel. Battery life is great as long as you use safari.

productPageReviews.reviewDescription: The blue is a beautiful silvery-sky color and the laptop works very nicely, especially in comparison to my 2015 MacBook which I recently dropped on concrete. So I certainly needed an updated laptop and I’m enjoying all of the sleek, fast technology of the 2025. It seems much more sturdy as well, so it should survive any unfortunate falls (although I do not plan on having any), and should last me a while yet. The battery life also surprised me (since when do I not need to charge a laptop every 4 hours?!) and it’s actually super lightweight and easy to carry with me for college classes, hobby writing and work. All round, it’s been one of my most expensive but much worth it purchases of the year

productPageReviewsFromOtherCountries.reviewDescription: I upgraded to the new 13 inch MacBook Air with the M4 chip and it has completely exceeded my expectations. The performance is fast and responsive, even with multiple apps and tabs open at the same time. Video editing, browsing, and school work all feel effortless.The battery life is incredible. I can get through a full day of classes and still have plenty of charge left. The display is bright and colorful with excellent sharpness that makes everything look better.The design is slim, light, and easy to carry. The keyboard feels great to type on and the trackpad is smooth and accurate. The new Sky Blue color looks beautiful in person.The webcam quality is a big improvement and video calls look sharp. I also love the MagSafe charging which is convenient and safe.If I had to point out a downside it would be the limited number of ports, but that is easy to solve with a small adapter. Everything else about this laptop is top tier.Overall this is the best MacBook Air yet. It is powerful, portable, and has amazing battery life. Absolutely worth the five stars.
productPageReviewsFromOtherCountries.variant: Capacity: 16GB Unified Memory, 256GB SSD Storage, Color: Sky Blue, Set: Without AppleCare+

productPageReviewsFromOtherCountries.reviewDescription: Genuine product. Quick delivery. Easy set up. Fast laptop. Pairs easily with iPhone so you have access to everything you need. easy to use, doesn't take long to get used to using this over any other laptop type. I went from a 2013 MacBook Pro to this, and it puts that to shame. Screen is very clear for editing photos or videos. good motivator to start doing and trying new things too since it's a great creative tool because its been made so easy. would highly recommend apple laptops in general but for the price this is a steal.

sustainabilityFeatures.title: Energy efficiency
sustainabilityFeatures.description: Conserves energy compared to similar products.

certifiedBy.name: EPEAT
certifiedBy.description: EPEAT certifies electronic products based on sustainability impacts across their life cycle including requirements for energy efficiency and end-of-life management. An EPEAT registered product can also meet optional more ambitious criteria including reduction of fluorinated greenhouse gases (F-GHGs). Products meeting 50% - 74% optional criteria are 'Silver' and those meeting 75% or more are 'Gold'.Learn more about this certification

description: A simple way to take on your day. The Inspiron 15 laptop is as stylish on the outside as it is efficient on the inside. Built with up to 13th Gen Intel processors, you can finish your to-do list in no time. Your Inspiron PC is now ready for business with military-grade testing for added reliability and an easy-to-use, built-in Trusted Platform Module to protect your data. Connect all your personal and business devices with a range of options. Enjoy quality video chats with a built-in FHD webcam that keeps you looking your best. Easily spend more screen time on the things you enjoy with Dell ComfortView software, which is software solution that helps reduce harmful blue light emissions to keep your eyes comfortable over extended viewing times, like your next movie marathon. Adaptive thermals keep your PC running efficiently, whether at your desk or working from your lap. Your Inspiron 15 notebook intelligently adjusts its power and thermals to keep running smoothly, using advanced algorithms and accelerometers.
features: Plenty of Ports: Connect all your devices with a variety of ports.
Type With Ease: Write and calculate quickly with roomy keypads, separate numeric keypad and calculator hotkey.
Ergonomic Support: Keep your wrists comfortable as you type with the practical typing angle of the lift hinge.

Stay Connected To What You Love: Enjoy quality video chats with a built-in HD webcam that keeps you looking your best. Easily spend more screen time on the things you enjoy with Dell ComfortView software, which is a TUV Rheinland certified solution* that reduces harmful blue light emissions to keep your eyes comfortable over extended viewing times, like your next movie marathon. *Global (except China): TÜV Rheinland Certified (ID# 1111265303 Low Blue Light Content).

Adapt to Any Situation: Adaptive thermals keep your PC running efficiently, whether at your desk or working from your lap. Your Inspiron 15 intelligently adjusts its power and thermals to keep running smoothly, using advanced algorithms and accelerometers.

aPlusContent.title: From the manufacturer
aPlusContent.rawText:
From the manufacturer
Inspiron 15 

15.6-inch laptop perfect for everyday use, in a stylish, thoughtful design. Featuring the Intel processors. 
15.6 inch FHD (1920 x 1080) 120Hz 250 nits WVA Anti- Glare LED Backlit Narrow Border Display
13th Generation Intel Core i3-1305U (10 MB cache, 5 cores, 6 threads, up to 4.50 GHz) Processor 
Intel UHD Graphics 
512GB M.2 PCIe NVMe Solid State Drive
8 GB, 1 x 8 GB, DDR4, 2666 MHz Memory
Windows 11 brings you closer to what you love 

Family, friends, obsessions, music, creations Windows 11 is the one place for it all. With a fresh new feel and tools that make it easier to be efficient, it has what you need for whatever’s next. 
A simple way to take on your day 
The Inspiron 15 is as stylish on the outside as it is efficient on the inside. Built with 13th Gen Intel processors, you can finish your to-do list in no time. 
Stay connected to what you love 
Enjoy quality video chats with a built-in HD webcam that keeps you looking your best. Easily spend more screen time on the things you enjoy with Dell ComfortView software, which is software solution that helps reduce harmful blue light emissions to keep your eyes comfortable over extended viewing times, like your next movie marathon. 
Simple details, elevated experiences 
Plenty of ports: Connect all your devices with a variety of ports. 
Type with ease: Write and calculate quickly with roomy keypads, separate numeric keypad and calculator hotkey. 
Ergonomic support: Keep your wrists comfortable as you type with the practical typing angle of the lift hinge. 
Adapt to any situation 
Adaptive thermals keep your PC running efficiently, whether at your desk or working from your lap. Your Inspiron 15 intelligently adjusts its power and thermals to keep running smoothly, using advanced algorithms and accelerometers. Plus, minimize your time plugged into an outlet with ExpressCharge , which can recharge your battery 80% in 60 minutes. 
ExpressCharge must be enabled within Dell Power Manager software. System must be powered off or in hibernation mode for ExpressCharge feature to function. After charging has reached the stated capacity, charging speed will return to normal speed. Recommended for use with the provided Dell power adapter; not recommended with a smaller capacity power adapter. Charging times may vary. 
Ports and Slots 
1. SD card reader | 2. USB 2.0 | 3. Headset jack | 4. Power jack | 5. HDMI 1.4 | 6. USB 3.2 Gen 1 Type-A | 7. USB 3.2 Gen 1 Type-C (Data Only)

productPageReviews.reviewTitle: FAST! - clear - user-friendly - perfect for an old-timer with minimal computer needs.
productPageReviews.reviewDescription: Had to upgrade to Windows 11 and this laptop has all the features (plus many more) as my 10-year-old Dell Inspiron 3520, so it should work out fine.  My only problem has been getting Microsoft to recognize my new email address and sync with my cellphone, but that's a separate issue.  The laptop is a 'beaut'...so much faster and clearer than Windows 10, and a lot more user friendly.  I was surprised to find that it doesn't have a removable battery (that's how old-school I am.)  If this holds up as well as the 3520 I'll be very happy.

productPageReviews.reviewDescription: This is my second Dell.  I bought the other four years ago, and it survived a lot of abuse.  I even spilled water on the keyboard of the last one, and it never stopped.  I have never had problems with this Dell or the last.  The only reason I had to buy a replacement is that the last one got knocked off of the table and the place where you plug it in was damaged.  Yet, we kept rigging it up and it worked for months.  I finally decided to get a new one when it became to difficult to keep charged due to the damage.  The sound quality is amazing and so are the visuals.  It is lightweight, so it is easy to carry around in a laptop bag.  Finally, it is easy to setup and use.  I am a loyal Dell customer now.  The price is very reasonable, so get yours now.  You won't regret it!

productPageReviews.reviewTitle: Nice little machine, great price, perfect for on the go
productPageReviews.reviewDescription: HP never fails me, this little laptop is perfect for what I needed. Simply a backup device in the case of a power outage or traveling. Super lightweight, faster than I was expecting for it's specs and the touchscreen is a bonus. Had a power outage already to put it to the test. Had multiple tabs open, music running and Office tasks and after the 4.5hour outage still had 88% battery.Note, I do not think you could easily upgrade the ram or m2 drive or replace the battery as the unit is sealed. There is no consumer way to access the inside without removing OEM stickers and casing that would surely void any warranty so keep that in mind.For a backup device that's very portable, and fast cant beat the price.

productPageReviews.reviewTitle: Feels Like the Perfect Start to College!
productPageReviews.reviewDescription: I just graduated high school and got this laptop to use for college — and so far, I really love it!  The setup took about an hour (mostly due to downloads), but it was super easy overall. The touchscreen is such a fun and useful feature — I honestly didn’t expect to love it this much! The big screen is another plus — everything looks super clear and easy to read, which makes using on it really enjoyable.The fan used to turn on for a minute and then turn off, but recently it hasn’t done that at all, still a little skeptical of it cuz lowk it’d be awkward if I’m taking an exam and everyone’s quiet and it turns on 😭 hopefully that won’t happen… Uhm anyways! haven’t used it in class yet since I just bought it during summer, but I start college next month and it definitely feels like it’ll handle everything I need. For around $400, it feels like a total bang for your buck, and I’m happy with it so far.I really hope this laptop sticks with me through all my college years! Wish me luck :)

aiReviewsSummary.text: Customers find this gaming laptop to be a great system that delivers tier mobile gaming performance and offers good value for money. The functionality, speed, heat level, sound quality, and graphics quality receive mixed feedback - while some say it runs well and excels in CPU performance, others report it completely stops working and becomes laggy. The laptop stays cool to the touch, though some customers mention overheating issues.

productPageReviews.reviewTitle: Powerful Gaming Laptop With Plenty of Resources!
productPageReviews.reviewDescription: Blazing fast, powerful CPU and graphics card, plenty of RAM and disk space, and so much more! I absolutely love my new laptop! It is fast, easy to setup and get fully updated, and runs games better than my desktop does!I purchased the laptop during Amazon's Prime day as a little bit of a splurge. My previous laptop was nearly 10 years old and was really showing it's age, so it was time for a replacement.I will mention a few items that I'm less than pleased with. First is the number pad that overlays on the mouse pad. This is just a bad idea all around. Sometimes I press the Num Lock button on accident and when that happens the mouse pad stops working as a mouse. Plus, when I have a Bluetooth keyboard attached and activate the Num Lock, it actives the one on the mouse pad as well.Second, unlike other laptops of this price range, it only came with Windows 11 Home edition instead of Pro edition. So I had to pay to upgrade it as I prefer the Pro version as I have more control over the configuration of Windows itself.Last, I wish the display was a touchscreen display. But alas, it was not included with this version.But, all-in-all, I am pleased with the performance, quality, and appearance of this laptop. My hope is that this laptop will provide me with years of use and enjoyment! So far, it's off to a great start!
productPageReviews.reviewedIn: Reviewed in the United States on July 30, 2025

productPageReviews.reviewTitle: DO NOT HESITATE! Awesome laptop!! Honestly…
productPageReviews.reviewDescription: Been using this for a little over a week now, the RTX 5060 performs superb! The screen is beautiful! Especially for being a laptop screen compared to an OLED display or monitor, it looks GREAT, the colors and overall image are very sharp lookingAll of my games( AAA titles or otherwise) run at high or ultra settings with high frame rates and no stutter! Going to be upgrading ram and storage down the lineRuns GTA V Enhanced on High RT over 100fps in most scenariosI’ve also run Warframe with the “high preset” and runs over 120fpsit looks beautiful and performs beautiful! I’m very picky when it comes to frame rate/graphics(coming from an avid desktop user…I have high expectations)and this laptop performs as good or better than it looks! I’m impressedThe speakers aren’t super impressive, and aren’t super loud or anything I wish they were a little better, but they’re not terrible by any means, just not super LOUD, most gamers would probably be using a headset anyway for voice chat/streaming/gameplay anyway…don’t let this steer you away, this is a great laptop despite not having “the best sound system in the world”I Don’t notice any excessive fan noise or overheating issues of any kindI’m using it everyday for gaming and I can’t leave it alone! When I have lan parties at friends houses, my trusty machine comes with me!I’m always excited to open the lid, plug it in and start gaming! The RGB lighting is gorgeous! It’s also fun to show off to friends and family ;)I’ve owned many gaming laptops over the last 12 years or so, this is my second machine with an 5060 in it,  and this one has been my favorite!  Better than any of the rest!
productPageReviews.reviewedIn: Reviewed in the United States on October 2, 2025

productPageReviews.reviewTitle: Solid built, fast and plenty of inputs
productPageReviews.reviewDescription: Have not had it long, not really a hardcore gamer, mostly play WoT, which this is overkill for. I do like the RGB, though the keyboard isn't the easiest to ready(prefer the keyboard on my MSI thin 15, much easier to see for these old eyes). I use a separate mouse/KB combo so that negates the laptops kb issue for me. Everything else with this Asus is far superior to the MSI. Ease of access to upgrade drive and memory is the major perk with this Asus, it's a breeze. Added a Samsung 990 2tb NVMe.It has a quality feel, it's fast, the price was right. Wifi works great, and so far no heating issues. Playing WoT probably isn't push it much, but it's sitting on a Klim turbo frost cooling pad, mainly for having filtered air entering the laptop. The laptop fits this cooling pad perfectly and it's not noisy at all. No issues holding up to my TV using HDMI to get a nice big picture while blowing up tanks.
productPageReviews.reviewedIn: Reviewed in the United States on September 15, 2025

title: HP Chromebook 14 Laptop, Intel Celeron N4120, 4 GB RAM, 64 GB eMMC, 14" HD Display, Chrome OS, Thin Design, 4K Graphics, Long Battery Life, Ash Gray Keyboard (14a-na0226nr, 2022, Mineral Silver)
inStockText: In Stock  In Stock
breadCrumbs: Electronics > Computers & Accessories > Computers & Tablets > Laptops > Traditional Laptops
description: Whether you need a laptop for work, college, or everyday computing, the HP Chromebook 14 Laptop has got you covered. Watch movies or view spreadsheets in high-quality HD and in direct sunlight with a 14-inch anti-glare, micro-edge screen (1). Plus, with custom-tuned dual speakers, you’ll enjoy clear authentic audio to elevate all of your entertainment needs. Not only is this Chromebook outfitted for relaxing, but it’s also a productivity powerhouse. The HP laptop computer’s portable and lightweight design lets you take it just about anywhere, while the Intel® Celeron N4120 processor touts plenty of power for even your busiest days (2). Enjoy the highest resolution games and movies with the 4K-ready Intel UHD Graphics 600 (3) (4). Multitask faster, even with multiple windows open, and safely store more content with this HP 14-inch laptop’s 4 GB of RAM and 64 GB of eMMC storage (5).Pull all-nighters or binge-watch your favorite show with confidence thanks to your HP notebook computer’s 14 hours of battery life (6). When you do run short on power, just plug in your Chromebook charger and HP Fast Charge takes your battery to 50% in just 45 minutes (7). Not only does the Chrome OS give you greater security and an always up-to-date experience, but you can also take advantage of millions of apps in the Google Play Store (8). Work confidently with a 1-year limited hardware warranty and stay connected with the dependable 802.11a/b/g/n/ac (2x2) Wi-Fi and Bluetooth combo (9) (10). Expand the way you game, work, and create with the innovative HP Imagepad, a true multi-touch touchpad that supports four-finger gestures. Your HP 4K laptop isn’t just built for greater productivity and more immersive entertainment, but also for sustainability. Do your part toward a cleaner planet with an ENERGY STAR certified (11) and EPEAT Silver registered (12) Chromebook 14-inch.
features: FOR HOME, WORK, & SCHOOL – With an Intel processor, 14-inch display, custom-tuned stereo speakers, and long battery life, this Chromebook laptop lets you knock out any assignment or binge-watch your favorite shows..Voltage:5.0 volts

HD DISPLAY, PORTABLE DESIGN – See every bit of detail on this micro-edge, anti-glare, 14-inch HD (1366 x 768) display (1); easily take this thin and lightweight laptop PC from room to room, on trips, or in a backpack.
ALL-DAY PERFORMANCE – Reliably tackle all your assignments at once with the quad-core, Intel Celeron N4120—the perfect processor for performance, power consumption, and value (2).
4K READY – Smoothly stream 4K content and play your favorite next-gen games with Intel UHD Graphics 600 (3) (4).
MEMORY AND STORAGE – Enjoy a boost to your system’s performance with 4 GB of RAM while saving more of your favorite memories with 64 GB of reliable flash-based eMMC storage (5).

DESIGNED TO KEEP UP WITH YOU – Get everything on your to-do list done with up to 14 hours of battery life (6); plus, HP Fast Charge technology charges your laptop computer from 0 to 50% in approximately 45 minutes, so you never miss a beat (7).

CHROME OS AND WARRANTY – Redefine how you work and play with the always secure and up-to-date Chrome browser, offering a huge selection of android apps in the Google Play Store (8). Start computing with confidence as your Google Chromebook laptop is covered by a 1-year limited hardware warranty.
ROCK SOLID CONNECTIVITY – Experience powerful connectivity with the 802.11a/b/g/n/ac (2x2) Wi-Fi and Bluetooth combo, perfect for remote work, modern games, or streaming your favorite show (9) (10).
MULTI-TOUCH TOUCHPAD – Your device’s full-size keyboard features a true multi-touch touchpad that supports four-finger gestures and lets you scroll, zoom, and navigate with a simple touch.
SUSTAINABLE DESIGN – HP is committed to global citizenship and environmental responsibility—that’s why this laptop Chromebook is ENERGY STAR certified (11) and EPEAT Silver registered (12).

productPageReviews.reviewTitle: Lightweight, Fast, and Perfect for Everyday Use!
productPageReviews.reviewDescription: I’m really impressed with this Chromebook. It’s lightweight and easy to carry, but still feels sturdy and well made. The setup was quick and simple, and it runs fast with no lag for web browsing, streaming, and everyday tasks. The battery life is excellent—I can go most of the day without recharging. productPageReviews.reviewTitle: A beautiful dependable system with long battery life
productPageReviews.reviewDescription: I bought this computer as a backup for my work, and I love it. The battery lasts all day while I am working. I love the build quality. Unlike my previous laptops, this does not have holes that allow it to cool at the bottom; these are above the keyboard instead. This is great because I never experience overheating if I place my computer on fabric or plastic which seems to block the holes on other systems I've owned.This is not a touch screen computer, and the keyboard is not backlit either, but these were not among my list of requirements. After owning this for a year, the screen opens and closes nicely. It is neither too slack nor too tight. Additionally, since it has a long hinge that connects the top to the bottom from side to side, the hinge is less likely to break.I love this system and highly recommend it.

productPageReviewsFromOtherCountries.reviewDescription: CONFEZIONEArriva in una robusta scatola con illustrazioni e sintetiche informazioni un Tablet della Lenovo mod. Tab P11 corredato di alimentatore da 20W max, cavo usbA/usbC lungo circa 120cm e spilla per apertura slot microSD. Manuale d’uso incluso con traduzione anche in italiano.MATERIALI E DESIGNRealizzato con una struttura in alluminio e policarbonato di buona qualità, di colore grigio ardesia e forma rettangolare, misura circa 160x260 mm con uno spessore di appena 7,5 mm, angoli e bordi arrotondati, con una cornice di ridotte dimensioni ed un peso bilanciato di circa 490g.Buone le caratteristiche tecniche, direi ottime per questa fascia di prezzo.Questo tablet Lenovo Tab P11 si presenta con un display IPS da 11 pollici con risoluzione 2000 x 1200 pixel e una cornice lungo tutto il perimetro di soli 2cm, sul profilo destro troviamo l'ingresso USB Type-C, sul lato superiore lo slot per scheda d’espansione memoria microSD, mentre sulla parte opposta i pin magneti per l’attacco di una tastiera non inclusa.I pulsanti di accensione e volume li troviamo sul bordo dell’angolo sinistro superiore perché è un tablet per gestione primaria orizzontale, mentre la fotocamera frontale di 8 Mp sul profilo più lungo e si comporta bene in condizioni di luminosità favorevoli, quella della fotocamera posteriore invece è di 13 Mp con flash led per buoni scatti, mentre la risoluzione dei video Full HD si dimostra molto buona per videochiamate con qualità piuttosto nitida.Ottima anche la qualità audio a 4 speaker 2 per lato e 2 microfoni.Con chipset Qualcomm Snapdragon 662 comprensivo di un processore octa-core con frequenza di clock massima di 2.3 GHz, 4 GB di RAM, 128 GB di storage interno espandibile tramite microSD, Bluetooth 5.1.La batteria integrata ricaricabile da 7500 mAh garantisce un’autonomia di circa 9 ore di uso medio intenso e 2 giorni di normale uso, ovviamente se impiegato con attenzione sarà possibile arrivare fino a 3/4 giorni senza la necessità di ricaricarlo. Mediante alimentatore per ricarica rapida si potrà effettuare una carica completa in circa 2 ore.Acquistando a parte una Lenovo pen 2 il display potrà essere utilizzato anche per prendere appunti o disegnare con buona precisione e per un utilizzo basic, certo non è paragonabile ai top di gamma ma molto superiore ai pari fascia di prezzo.Questo Tab11 collegato ad una tastiera e mouse bluetooth permette di lavorare fluidamente con programmi di scrittura.Utilizzato con videogiochi pesanti si potrà giocare solo a dettagli medi, mentre con i titoli leggeri va molto meglio, anche in esterno sotto la luce del sole peccato che il trattamento oleofobico non sia dei migliori (rimangono facilmente le ditate sullo schermo).Il display è comunque uno dei punti forza di questo Tablet ed è possibile modificare i vari parametri (es. temperatura colore) entrando nelle impostazioni, così come i 4 speaker dolby atmos.Attraverso l'app pre-installata “Dolby Atmos” sarà possibile equalizzare il suono a piacimento e in base alla scena (film, musica, giochi ecc).Su questo Tablet oltre al sistema principale Android 10 troviamo diversi programmi preinstallati pronti per un uso ottimale ma stranamente per l’archivio fotografico manca un’app di galleria di default.UTILIZZOIn mano risulta piacevole al tatto e sicuro grazie alle compatte dimensioni e all’elegante design,adatto per tutti coloro che utilizzano il tablet come uno smartphone per scrivere, navigare e chattare con le principali app.Facile e intuitivo il menù, ottima e personalizzabile (es. in dimensioni, posizione ecc…) la gestione del tastierino, così come chiaro, reattivo e ben leggibile è l’ampio e luminoso display.CONCLUSIONIQuesto tablet con un design pulito e perfettamente portatile, è idoneo per tutti coloro che hanno necessità di un dispositivo classico per scrivere, disegnare, navigare, chattare ecc….Ottima autonomia e audio potente, oltre che prestazioni equilibrate.Eccellente il rapporto qualità prezzo, utilissimo per un uso studentesco, universitario, per fare lavori con i programmi di scrittura collegandosi ad un mouse e ad una tastiera.Spero che questa mia esperienza possa esservi utile nella scelta.

productPageReviews.reviewDescription: At first I was a lot skeptical of this "laptop" as it boasts that it is a "Chromebook killer" in many reviews.  Having read many reviews on many different Chromebooks, weighed the functionality between this book and the Chromebook, I ultimately chose the HP Stream 11".As a student, I am oftentimes not online when I am doing my schoolwork during downtime at work, I needed a machine that was lightweight, able to perform the same functions as my laptop but smaller and easier to carry.  I have had this machine for 2 days, and I have fallen in love.Here are some things I have noticed in the short time:-While small, the keyboard is almost the same size as my 15in laptop and the keys are easy to adjust to.-The screen is bright and I don't have to have the brightness turned all the way up in order to view comfortably.  I have seen mixed reviews on this issue, but I dont see the problem-Not laggy.  I haven't noticed any lag, at all.  While setting the machine up I was downloading and installing windows updates, installing a mouse driver, installing Norton Security and office 365 (which was included free) and the machine never skipped a beat.  I was able to do everything in a couple of hours, even setting up the OneDrive storage to make my laptop files available to this machine.  I was impressed that even running Chrome (which can be a memory hog) I have several tabs open at a time and no changes.-At this moment, I have 2 word documents open, 3 chrome tabs open and an additional tab open with youtube and I pulled up a movie purchased through Google, not a hiccup.  Played flawlessly at full screen with no problems.-I haven't tested the SD card capability, however I currently have a 32gig USB flash drive in and it is working fine (I had read some reviews that the machine would only read 16gigs of removable media)-Fanless.  I can sit this thing anywhere with no fear of overheating or burning my legs.  It has been running for 5 solid hours with very little warmth from the bottom.  Also, quieter.-Speakers sound good.  I was able to hear my school lecture clearly over the road noise while driving (no I wasn't operating my laptop while driving, I turned it on, set it in the passenger seat and went)  Even through the youtube channel, I was able to hear my movie clearly and the sound isn't up much at all.-I was able to install printer drivers.  Yes I know, it is 2015, cloud servers, Bluetooth printers, etc... I still have an old school printer, and I have to plug it in and I experienced no problems.Things I am not so hot about:-The box I received from amazon had obviously been opened and someone had this machine prior to me.  They fixed it, but it still grated my nerves a bit.  I expected better.-The mouse.  Call me old fashioned, call me whatever but this mouse is set to the lightest sensitivity and sometimes doesn't register my taps... only happened a couple of times, might be a PEBKAC error... more on this later.-Hard Drive. I understand, it's supposed to be a lightweight, functional, blah blah blah windows version of a Chromebook.  But windows holds most of the hard drive and after installing office, updates, norton and other drivers, I am left with only 6g.  I can save to my USB, but still, maybe up the HD to 64g or 2 smaller HDs equalling a larger amount.  I just feel so limited in that aspect.-I keep hitting CAPS lock.  ugh.-Google offers 2 years of storage ranging from 100gb to 200gb; MS went with 1TB of storage but for only a year.  Not so pleased with that, will be purchasing a MyCloud in the future anyways, but I would rather a longer use of storage.-I have yet to receive 7 or 8 or however many hours of battery life they say this offers.  The most I have seen from the battery meter is 5 hours when I am using it, tested that tonight, went ahead and plugged in after 5, and I am using the recommended settings from HP.-FN (function) keys are backward.  When I would normally hit fn then the sound, or display, and not have to hit anything just to f5 or alt-f4, I have to hit the fn key to use any f-key... just taking some getting used to.-Chrome is a memory hog, it's getting annoying actually, I have the same issue on my laptopThings that make me LOL at other reviewers:-If you are using an online storage system and don't want to use the memory on your machine, you have to make sure that are aren't keeping the files available offline.  If you keep them offline, then you are essentially saving 2 copies and using both your online storage and hard drive.-I read several reviews where people blamed the machine for viruses.... seriously?The main reason I chose this over a chromebook...-Functionality.  As a student, I need MS Office, access to my printer and a machine that will work when offline.  Chromebook didn't seem to offer that.All in all, i am pretty pleased with my purchase. Will be back to update if necessary =)
productPageReviews.reviewedIn: Reviewed in the United States on May 22, 2015

Easy to set up and use with very good screen resolution. Quick response adds to quality and capability. Very pleased with my purchase.
productPageReviews.reviewedIn: Reviewed in the United States on September 12, 2025

productPageReviews.reviewTitle: Spend your money on another product
productPageReviews.reviewDescription: I purchased this computer as a replacement for my 4.5 year old macbook which died suddenly.Pros: I like the pink color. The laptop is very light and it was very easy to set up.Cons: Overall, I am very disappointed with this product. I know that I shouldn't have expected that much from a computer that cost under $200. The computer also lived up to expectations (... complaints) that I had heard from others regarding HP.It was very difficult to do anything on the computer without it slowing down. I bought an extra memory card but it did not seem to make a difference. Windows 8 was not the best, and anytime I tried to multitask or had too many browser tabs open, it slowed down immensely and told me that memory use was low.Aside from the computer itself, I was very dissatisfied with the customer service from HP. About 9 months after purchasing the computer, I had an issue where the screen started blacking out and the machine would shut off, but still indicate it was charging. After attempting to contact HP for over 15 minutes on the phone, I was informed that even though my computer was under warranty, I would have to pay for shipping (and by shipping they meant that I had to pay them to send me a box that I would send back to them). I did that and a few weeks later received a call telling me that my computer issues were not covered under the warranty, but that I could pay to have them shipped. The caller did not give me his name or phone number, and of course we were disconnected. A few days later, I received my broken laptop back in the mail. The entire customer service experience was awful and something I did not experience with Apple or Toshiba (my prior computers).Overall, I would not recommend this computer. Pay a little more and don't get HP!
productPageReviews.reviewedIn: Reviewed in the United States on October 17, 2015

productPageReviewsFromOtherCountries.reviewDescription: Awesome little laptop! I bought this as I will be going to college in the fall and wanted something cute and easy to carry around. It is very light and compact, does everything I need it to and I've received tons of compliments! Definitely happy with this purchase, not to mention the cheap price :) Also it shipped quicker than expected which was another bonus.

productPageReviewsFromOtherCountries.reviewTitle: This laptop is just perfect for what I wanted
productPageReviewsFromOtherCountries.reviewDescription: This laptop is just perfect for what I wanted! As a university student with a laptop that stopped working, I wanted something small, versatile, fast, and functional and this is exactly that. Keyboard is great, screen is small but not too small, and it works really well. Great price, and highly recommend!

productPageReviewsFromOtherCountries.reviewTitle: Fast, reliable and affordable if you clean it up from bloatware.
productPageReviewsFromOtherCountries.reviewDescription: Awesome!!!I was looking for a fast, affordable and reliable computer for university. I knew the only thing I needed for it was office and very few other programs to be able to accomplish this. After following the amazing night review from another Amazon user, I was on board. I bought it and followed his instructions to the T, and now I have a super fast, bloatware-free and smooth computer. I'm super happy about this purchase!

productPageReviewsFromOtherCountries.reviewTitle: Depends on what you need but overall, good for the price!
productPageReviewsFromOtherCountries.reviewDescription: I bought this StreamBook to replace my at home "hanging on the couch and cruising the internet" laptop that finally crapped out on me. Overall, it was a good price, fits my simple needs and I love the colour.Like other netbooks/streambooks/etc that are meant to use cloud/internet based storage - there is very little memory in which to store pictures/docs/music/etc. And, for not having a lot of storage, it comes pre-loaded with a TON of crapware (That I chose to remove to get 5-6 gigs back). Also, the track pad / mouse pad is a little frustrating (inaccurate tracking, right-click non-existent  and you have to hard click in order for it to respond) - I  chose to pick up a small cheap usb mouse to use instead (so much better).Again, fits my needs, style and price range so I'm happy.

I was looking for a budget laptop and chose this one. I mostly use my phone, my tablet or my computer at work but I needed something for the few productive things i want to do when at home. Browse the web and use excel and word and thats it. Very satisfied. The other reviews are right. Yes the screen display is not the best around and yes the mouse pad a little sturdy. But for that price (259$) i mean you get what you pay for : a good budget laptop. No you cant play 3D games or use photoshop but if you are looking for a cheap and good laptop for simple tasks its a good value choice. I recommend it. Plus its purple and pink!

productPageReviews.reviewedIn: Reviewed in the United States on August 20, 2025

productPageReviews.reviewTitle: SELLER UPGRADED BEYOND CAPACITY VOIDING WARRANTY FROM HP: OVERHEATING + UPDATE
productPageReviews.reviewDescription: DO NOT BUY THIS LAPTOP. I depend on customer reviews so I carefully researched laptops before ordering. I had this laptop for one week and noticed that the power cord box got very hot. Also, the bottom of the laptop would get unusually warm. One day I left the charger plugged in with the laptop closed. When I opened it, the power would not come on. I unplugged it, kept trying and it eventually came on once cool. I called HP for support and after telling them I had 16 GB RAM, they looked at the upgrades made by the seller and VOIDED MY WARRANTY! Here's the quote from the transcript: "The computer was originally manufactured with hardware that matched the requirement of this computer, however when I see your computer specifications now, it looks like it has been upgraded by seller beyond its holding capacity and unfortunately this has voided the manufacturing warranty on this computer and due to that we will not be able to provide any support from our end. There is a good chance that the problem that you are facing now could be possible because of these changes made."  So now I have to wipe the computer and return it with the prepaid label they are sending. Amazon is refunding the extra protection policy I purchased.  In addition, HP stated that I had 336 days left on my warranty even though I only had the computer for 7 days. Evidently, the seller must purchase them to upgrade and then resells them - creating the gap in the time expired from warranty duration. One more tip, HP agent said I could get a copy of the transcript after I close the chat... but don't close it yet, there's another button to push for transcript first before closing the chat.  This has been a totally frustrating experience and the seller should not upgrade unless more RAM is purchased. BUYER BEWARE!UPDATE: Returned laptop and got a notice about the refund and was glad until I saw the amount was over $130 LESS than what I paid. After contacting Amazon, they said the seller charged a restocking fee! I explained the entire situation and they reached out to the seller. The seller's reply: "In accordance with Amazon policies, we typically charge a restocking fee for used items or those damaged by customers. After reviewing your return reason, we have decided to trust your explanation and issue a full refund." The refund is labeled "Goodwill Refund". It is still about $8. short. I'm tired of fighting this battle. Where is the accountability for creating this problem? I have since purchased a new laptop through Microcenter and have purchased their Priority Plus plan which is worth its weight in gold. I can call up at anytime and they will remotely address any issues on my laptop.
productPageReviews.reviewedIn: Reviewed in the United States on September 17, 2025

The screen is perfect size for her and is easy to read.  She has had no connection issues with WiFi dropping at all since she began using this laptop.  She will take it around the house all day and th battery stays long and strong for her. She is able to go Mobile and remote and still be good to work.Great specs.  Great speed.  Lots of memory.  This was a great value for the price.
productPageReviews.reviewedIn: Reviewed in the United States on August 29, 2025

productPageReviews.reviewDescription: Just what I was looking for: a light-weight HP laptop that has Microsoft lifetime non-subscription,  upgraded features. I've been satisfactorily using Windows 10 on two 17-inch laptops (an HP and a Lenovo) for several years. But when Microsoft announced not supporting WIN 10 and encouraging the installation of WIN 11, I knew I would have to "bite the bullet" and upgrade before I ended up having to buy Windows 11. WIN 11 comes pre-installed. I've become accustomed to using Office suites since the mid-90s (okay, okay I'm now 78).  Free pre-installation of the latest of the non-subscription Office suites (2024) was a big plus when considering the purchase of this new laptop.  I hope I'm all set for the rest of my life.  I was also looking for a laptop that--as I age--I could much more easily carry around the house than I can right now carry my 17-inchers.  (It could also be easier to carry when I pack up other personals if ever notified to evacuate due to fire, wind, or earthquake.) Also, realizing that I didn't necessarily need a 17-inch laptop any longer, I chose a less expensive 15-incher. By the way, validating the pre-installed Office 2019 is easy. Just don't hurry, read everything on the screen as you work toward validation, and you'll be done with that step in four minutes! Watch that you do not install Microsoft 365 'cause you'll have to pay for and subscribe to it. If you don't need it, then Office is truly adequate for you. The legal pre-installed version of Office 2019 is genuine Microsoft software that does not come with a product key and, therefore, it does not need to be registered with Microsoft.  (If you have an online Microsoft account, it's up to you if you want to register the laptop itself.)  One more thing, once you're done with setup process, you'll notice that OneDrive is the default for synchronizing. If you're not familiar with OneDrive, go online to understand what it's for and how it works. Contact the seller via Amazon's communication feature for anything. Just click his name on the right side of the product description page and you'll arrive at the seller's profile with the link for communication in the upper right corner.

productPageReviews.reviewTitle: Powerful and Reliable – A Great Value for Serious Gamers
productPageReviews.reviewDescription: As someone who’s been building and using gaming PCs for years, I picked up the MSI Katana 15 HX B14WGK-016US primarily for portability without compromising performance—and I’m impressed with what this system delivers.First off, the Core i9-14900HX and RTX 5070 combo is no joke. This laptop chews through modern AAA titles without breaking a sweat. I’m seeing 100+ FPS on high to ultra settings in titles like Cyberpunk 2077, Hogwarts Legacy, and Call of Duty MW3, and it stays consistent even during long sessions. MSI did a solid job with thermals—kick on Cooler Boost and it stays cool enough without thermal throttling. The 165Hz display really helps the experience feel fluid in competitive titles.Stability is another strong point. No weird crashes, no blue screens, no random freezes—just reliable, smooth performance. And coming from a brand like MSI, that doesn’t surprise me. I’ve used their graphics cards and motherboards in my builds for years, and they’ve always delivered.  MSI overall I’ve had a good experience with their products That same engineering shows up in this laptop.That said, there are some things to be aware of. Battery life isn’t great—maybe 4 hours max under light use, and much less if you’re doing anything demanding. For some this laptop could be heavy for a 15-inch laptop, but others will say its not. I didn’t pick this laptop for its light weight design. It was about performance and portability. The chassis is plastic but metal feel and pretty basic clean design, though it feels solid enough. The RGB keyboard looks great, but the number pad layout is cramped and takes getting used to.Out of the box, expect sometime to setup— Windows updates, and drivers, etc.Bottom line: if you’re a gamer who prioritizes performance and value, this is a fantastic machine for the price. You’re getting high-end GPU and CPU power without paying $2K+. It's not a luxury laptop—it’s a focused, performance-driven tool for gaming and heavy workloads. Highly recommend for experienced users who want desktop-like power in a mobile form.
productPageReviews.reviewedIn: Reviewed in the United States on July 3, 2025

productPageReviews.reviewDescription: This one takes the cake. During the fourth of July sales going around from every major tech market, I did about two weeks of research only to come to terms that this was not only one of the cheapest options, but best priced options for everything that's attached to the motherboard. I was pleasantly surprised when I fired everything up and ran a few benchmarks to see just how well it did right out of the gate. Note, this is all without anything overclocked here. I mainly wanted to do some benchmarks without any tampering just to see how it ran. Here is my results;Superposition benchmark - average 80 frames (Could of been higher if frame gen was included but not too bad)Cyberpunk 2077 benchmark - average 124 frames (Ultra settings maxed, excluding a few ray tracing options)Path of Exile 2 End Game maps - average 80 frames (High settings, Frame gen hasn't been optimized in path yet, but runs amazingly well)Hogwarts Legacy  benchmark - average 100 frames (Ultra settings, frame gen has slight stutter frames but runs exceptionally well)Pros:- Runs games exceptionally well- Price is possibly the best for what you're getting- Though not OLED, the picture quality is very good- MSI and it's features are nice if you haven't tried them yet- Sleek and incredibly designCons:- Is quite noisy- Does run a little hot, might consider a cooling pad for better heal levels in peak moments- 1TB might not be enough if you're a serious gamerAll in all, its an incredible laptop for what you're getting. I'm thoroughly enjoying everything that it has offered thus far. All that's left is to focus overclocking and pushing it to the limit.
productPageReviews.reviewedIn: Reviewed in the United States on July 11, 2025

productPageReviews.reviewTitle: Great perfomance and specs for this price
productPageReviews.reviewDescription: Great performance and excellent specs (CPU & GPU) for the price. It runs anything with ease, with FPS in games reaching up to 300, and the system stays surprisingly cool. The cooling fans are powerful, so they can get a bit noisy at times, but if you’re using a headset or the built-in speakers, you’ll hardly notice after a few minutes playing. Overall, a fantastic choice—I can easily recommend it.

Well, duh.

productPageReviews.reviewDescription: I used to like Acer:I received the laptop a few days ago.  I followed the very sparse getting started instructions and plugged the charging cord into the Aspire GO 15 laptop and then into the wall socket.  Immediately, upon plugging in, sparks and FIRE shot out of the electrical socket I plugged it into & in the other sockets in the same room.  VERY DANGEROUS!!  I immediately unplugged it from the wall.The weird thing is the computer seems to work fine, I was able to set it up and set up my email account too. It seems that it was already fully charged when it arrived??  But, I'm pretty sure the fire and sparks caused damage to my electrical wiring. I'm afraid to use the electrical socket now, as it might cause a fire in the wall, if the wiring encasing has melted.I filled out the refund or return online form here at Amazon... two days in a row.  But, they are silent. The form says I need to erase any personal information before sending the computer back.  But, I don't know how long the computer will continue working without being charged and no one has offered to send me a label to send it back.  I've heard absolutely nothing from Amazon or Acer.So, I am inclined to just report this very dangerous product to the  "Consumer Protective Safety Commission". It could have very easily caused a fire or injured someone who was too near the socket.  I believe the battery and charger is from Thailand and they got it from China.  China has recently had some of their battery chargers recalled.  This one should be recalled too... in my opinion.
productPageReviews.reviewedIn: Reviewed in the United States on August 11, 2025

productPageReviewsFromOtherCountries.reviewTitle: If you are in the UK / Europe read my review before you buy.
productPageReviewsFromOtherCountries.reviewDescription: This is a U.S. made laptop which while having all you might expect, and I have no complaints re the quality or performance the annoying / frustrating thing is that the keyboard is for the U.S. user and consequently there is no UK Pound key, it,s the $ key also the @ key for UK use is the exclamation mark key. That is when you switch the the UK key format which very frequently just reverts back to the U.S. mode !!!!I have tried to contact the ACER support service through the contacts provided but these turn out to be in Taiwan who replied in Chinese. Unfortunately since I am only a home use user I only started to find these problems after the Amazon return date . My next move is to contact Which Computer Services and see if they can sort the keyboard problem out for me. Lesson learned !!!
