productPageReviews.reviewTitle: I am absolutely loving this Chromebook!
productPageReviews.reviewDescription: For me, it's been a total game-changer because I just needed something simple and reliable for my everyday stuff. It's the perfect companion for managing my digital life without any of the usual hassle. Great replacement for my broken laptop.Honestly, it's been perfect for all my essentials—things like paying bills, catching up on emails, and just browsing the web. The thing is seriously fast; it boots up in just a few seconds and handles everything without a problem. And the best part? There's no junk software or bloatware to get in the way—just a clean, secure operating system that does what it's supposed to. It is Lenovo, which I also love.If you're like me and just want a no-fuss machine that's great at the basics, you've got to check this out. It's an amazing value and has really made my digital routine so much easier. I honestly can't recommend it enough!
productPageReviews.reviewedIn: Reviewed in the United States on August 24, 2025

productPageReviews.reviewDescription: Nice Chromebook! I bought it for half the price as an Amazon Renewed item and it arrived in perfect condition and to my surprise it came in the original box (it was open but sealed with tape) so I assume someone bought it and maybe used it for like a couple of hours and said "I don't like it" or something.Pros: Huuuge screen, you can perfectly watch a movie or videos here and in good quality. The screen is not perfect but for this price it is awesome.- Battery: I've been using it for a couple of hours now with the full charge and so far with medium brightness settings it has consumed around 40% and I've been watching videos, browsing internet etc. OH btw it only took 1 hour or maybe less to fully charge it.- Numeric keyboard babyyy! Huge screen and great keyboard, keep in mind it's not backlighted so better look for a place with enough light to use it.- ChromeOS: This OS is packed with more than enough apps and features for a person who simply enjoys scrolling through the internet, read emails, check the weather and of course multimedia. If you're coming from Windows, don't give up on it trust me it is an awesome OS and you have embedded options such as Google Workspace and GDrive to carrry around your files not just on the laptop but on your cellphone, regardless of your phone OS (Android - iPhone)----------------------------Cons:This processor is a basic option to browse the web and basic stuff, heavy Android apps will probably experience lag, so beware that heavy apps may affect performance on the system. If you're planning on downloading games or something like that, maybe this is not your option.Screen isn't the best, some colors can look washed out... Remember you get what you paid for, if you want a better screen then you will probably have to spend a little more.
productPageReviews.reviewedIn: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024

productPageReviews.reviewDescription: Not sure why but I got this same laptop in September and it was not touch screen so when I purchased it again (after a cup of water mishap with the lap) I was surprised that it was a touchscreen after all. Touchscreen is very sensitive. Apps seem to have a hard time loading sometimes and Netflix will close itself out after a little while. I like how it does connect to your gmail, so all of my stuff from my other laptop was transferred over even the screen saver. I believe it’s a tad over priced for the quality of the laptop. It’s a good easy laptop for college students (that’s mostly what I use it for)The shipping for two days was crazy to be honest $80. So I payed a total of $400 for this laptop.I will say keep cups of any liquids away from it and make sure you clean your keypad of dust etc. My last one got a cup of water spilt on it and automatically fried with no chance of drying it out or saving it.

productPageReviews.reviewTitle: BUYER BEWARE OF DELL, AMAZON AND THIRD PARTY SELLERS ON AMAZON!
productPageReviews.reviewDescription: BUYER BEWARE OF DELL, AMAZON AND THIRD PARTY SELLERS ON AMAZON.  And extended warranty company Asurion.Amazon's  practice of listing and selling products like Dell computers for third party sellers seems like a scam, since the third party seller can sell old products on Amazon where the warranty is already expired or almost so.  And I saw nothing on AMAZON's site when I bought the DELL computer that things like an expired or limited time warranty could be an issue when buying ON AMAZON from a third party seller.Bought this Dell computer on Amazon, July 16, 2024, and Jan.3, 2025 the screen separated from the cover.  Contacted Dell, and they advised the WARRANTY was EXPIRED!  That's less than 6 months.  Dell said the AMAZON third party seller resold the computer on AMAZON months after it bought the computer, and the warranty began to run earlier when the third party seller bought the computer. Not when I purchased the computer on Amazon!Spent hours on the phone with Dell, and they know about this issue with third party sellers.  Even after providing them with the Amazon invoice and receipt of when I took possession of the computer, they would not help me and apply and run the warranty to the date I bought the computer from Amazon.Amazon's rep basically said sorry, but that's my problem for buying from a third party seller. Say what?  I bought the computer on AMAZON and paid AMAZON.  Now I'm out of luck?To make matters worse, I bought an extended warranty on Amazon from Asurion on the same day I bought the Dell computer on Amazon.  When I tried to make a claim, Asurion auto responded that the Dell computer still has the manufactures warranty and to contact Dell, seemingly as a result of only having purchased the computer from Amazon in July.  And not taking into account that the warranty started to run when the third party seller bought the computer months earlier.Shame on Dell, Amazon, and Asurion.

description: The Lenovo IdeaPad Slim 3 Chromebook is built for those who live vibrantly. Easily balance work and play all day with up to 13.5 hours of battery life and the efficient MediaTek Kompanio 520 processor. The 14" HD display with front-facing Waves MaxxAudio®-tuned speakers boosts your projects and entertainment alike.
features: FIND BALANCE AND LIVE VIVACIOUSLY - Effortlessly balance work and play with the lightweight IdeaPad Slim 3 Chromebook, featuring WiFi 6 and up to 13.5 hours of battery life.
WORK HARD, PLAY HARD - Elevate your playlist with Waves MaxxAudio-tuned stereo speakers and bask in the 14” HD display.
GO FAR, STAY CHARGED - Life on the go has never felt so grounded. With up to 13.5 hours of battery life, the IdeaPad Slim 3 Chromebook can keep up with your farthest-flung adventures.
PRIVACY IS CALLING - Keep your conversations secure and private with a privacy shutter built into the HD camera and a mute key.
MINIMAL WEIGHT, MAXIMUM COOL - Weighing just 2.87 lbs and enclosed in an abyss blue chassis, this laptop is effortlessly chic and light.
ROOM FOR ALL THE ESSENTIALS - Collaborate with an array of connectivity options, including a USB-C port that simultaneously charges, transfers files, and syncs to a monitor.
YOUR ULTIMATE COMPANION - Ensure your work and study sessions flow naturally with the efficient MediaTek Kompanio 520 Processor, packed in a quiet chassis.
ELIMINATE SINGLE-USE PACKAGING - Avoid single-use packaging waste with a more innovative, conscientious design.

productPageReviews.reviewDescription: For what this is, it's great.  I did not buy this to be my main laptop.  This is what I use for work - create spreadsheets, Word docs, internet access, music,  create and cast simple presentations.  For these tasks this has been the perfect tool.  The build quality is great - the keyboard feels very good.  The camera quality has been great for video calls.The one knock, as has been said in other reviews, is the screen.  It is not amazing but it's clear and it works for what I use this for.  If this was my only computer and I wanted to watch movies on it often it would be a let down.  For streaming a game or video while at work - it's perfect.Overall, for the price this has been an amazing machine for my purposes.  It's a very capable machine but if it got smashed in my shop I won't cry about it.

title: HP 14 Laptop, Intel Celeron N4020, 4 GB RAM, 64 GB Storage, 14-inch Micro-edge HD Display, Windows 11 Home, Thin & Portable, 4K Graphics, One Year of Microsoft 365 (14-dq0040nr, Snowflake White)
inStockText: Only 1 left in stock - order soon.  Only 3 left in stock - order soon.
breadCrumbs: Electronics > Computers & Accessories > Computers & Tablets > Laptops > Traditional Laptops
description: The Snowflake White HP 14 Laptop is designed to keep you productive and entertained from anywhere. Maximize your viewing area and see every detail thanks to 6.5 mm micro-edge bezel display, 79% screen-to-body ratio, and 14-inch HD (1366 x 768) display (1) (2). Performance, power consumption, and value come together in the Intel® Celeron® N4020, the ideal processor for your busiest days (3). Enjoy the highest resolution games and movies with the 4K-ready Intel® UHD Graphics 600 (4) (5). Store more of what you love and multitask faster, even with multiple windows open, with this HP laptop’s 64 GB of eMMC storage and 4 GB of RAM (6). Up your creativity and efficiency as this HP 14-inch laptop offers even more features for computing from anywhere. Spend more time focused on your daily tasks and less on the battery life with up to 11 hours and 30 minutes of power (7). Plus, HP Fast Charge keeps you powered especially if you need recharge quickly (8). The exceedingly secure Windows 10 Home in S mode outfits your PC laptop with fast boot times, increased responsiveness, and added protection against phishing and malware (9). Work confidently with 1-year limited hardware warranty and stay connected with the dependable Wi-Fi 5 (1x1) and Bluetooth® 4.2 combo (10) (11). Boost your creativity as your Windows laptop comes with a 1-year subscription to Microsoft 365, including the whole Office Suite: Word, Excel, and PowerPoint (12). Productivity and entertainment features aren’t the only things your device is equipped with; lead a sustainable lifestyle with a thin laptop that is ENERGY STAR® certified and EPEAT® Silver registered (13) (14). Up to 5.1GB of disk is reserved for system recovery software. Actual battery life will vary depending on configuration and maximum capacity will naturally decrease with time and usage. productPageReviews.reviewDescription: HP 14 Laptop (14-dq0040nr) – Affordable and Portable, but with Some Trade-offs⭐ Rating: 4.0/5 ⭐Pros:✅ Affordable Price – This HP 14 laptop is budget-friendly, making it a great option for students, light users, or those in need of a secondary device.✅ Portable & Lightweight – The thin and lightweight design makes it easy to carry around, ideal for on-the-go use.✅ Decent Display – The 14-inch HD micro-edge display offers clear visuals, though it's not full HD.✅ Windows 11 Home – Comes with the latest OS, which is optimized for modern applications.✅ 1-Year Microsoft 365 Subscription – A great addition for users who rely on Word, Excel, and other Office tools.Cons:❌ Limited Performance – The Intel Celeron N4020 processor is okay for basic tasks like web browsing, email, and document editing, but struggles with multitasking or demanding applications.❌ Only 4GB RAM – The memory is quite low for modern standards, leading to slower performance when multiple tabs or applications are open.❌ Minimal Storage (64GB eMMC) – The storage space is extremely limited, meaning you'll need external storage or cloud solutions for larger files.❌ Not Ideal for Heavy Use – Not recommended for gaming, video editing, or other intensive tasks.❌ No Backlit Keyboard – Typing in low-light conditions can be challenging.Final Verdict:The HP 14 Laptop (14-dq0040nr) is a solid choice for those needing an affordable, portable device for light tasks like browsing, streaming, and office work. However, its limited RAM and storage make it less suitable for power users or heavy multitaskers. If you need a simple laptop for everyday use and don't mind relying on cloud storage, this could be a good pick—but if you need better performance, consider upgrading to a model with more RAM and SSD storage.

productPageReviews.reviewDescription: I used this laptop for about six months. At first, it worked fine — good enough for basic tasks like typing documents, checking or sending emails, reading the news, and browsing social media. It served well as a simple “typewriter” and basic communication tool.However, after six months, it started slowing down noticeably. The biggest issue appeared when typing online — the system began to lag, even after I cleaned up unnecessary files. Sometimes it also takes a long time just to log in, which is frustrating.While it’s okay for light everyday use, this laptop is not well-suited for more demanding or creative tasks, like video editing or content creation.Overall, it’s acceptable for the price, but don’t expect long-term performance or power for serious work.

productPageReviews.reviewDescription: I hate that some people are having issues with these little computers but the one I received seems perfect. I've thoroughly inspected it and I've used it for several hours. It looks and works like new. I feel there is a distinct advantage to buying refurbished electronics like this. Someone bought it new and had problems with it so they returned it. The issues were resolved and it was sold to me. I now have a like new computer with all the problems worked out before I bought it at a great price. All my programs and apps loaded without any problems. Some seem to be receiving these computers without a power supply. Mine had one that was also in new condition. Would I like for the battery to last longer? Sure I would, but it lasts for several hours which is an acceptable amount of time and it recharges quickly. The screen is clear and sharp and the colors are excellent. The keyboard is also excellent with no "sticky keys." I bought this computer with a 256 gig hard drive so it has a lot of space left after loading my programs and apps, and the 4 gigs of RAM makes the computer fast enough for my needs. I have not noticed any lag time. The fact that it came with the latest version of Windows preinstalled was a strong selling point for me. I love that it folds up to work much like a tablet if I want. It’s a bit heavier than I expected but that is not a deal breaker for me. In summation, I couldn't be happier with this computer. I highly recommend the refurbished Dell Latitude 3190 HD 2-in-1 for anyone who is looking for a computer that is small but still powerful and easy to use. For the price, it is a true bargain. I would definitely buy it again, and I would recommend it to my friends and family.
productPageReviews.reviewedIn: Reviewed in the United States on October 8, 2025

productPageReviews.reviewDescription: Great value for the money! Minimal cosmetic wear and working like new. I tend to use my laptops plugged in anyways so it isnt a big deal to me. Having Windows 11 pre installed is nice too. Overall very happy with my purchase!

Upon turning on device, was prompted with with a BIOS boot message, that never goes away, device some times prompts different messages about time, or some other randomness when booting up, some letters in keyboard are stuck and must be fully depressed more than others , device also boots at random and says that there is no bootable drive, device did not charge and required to be plugged in at all times to remain on, device when running updates was flashing screen on and off repeatedly,  device should have been deemed inoperable and  has way too many issues will be exchanging device with seller if possible , to try a replacement, great idea poorly tested before selling, attempted to call number for batter issues met voicemail that had no greeting.

productPageReviews.reviewDescription: I had originally purchased a chromebook for college, but one of my labs required the desktop version of Excel. The laptop is really lightweight though, basically takes up very little room in my backpack. It's not a supercomputer, it's meant to be a nice laptop for watching things on, writing papers, and sending e-mails– I imagine some reviews will comment on this already, but this is not something you play games on. I'm surprised at how cheap it is though for how nice it's been! my only issue is that I peeled off the sticker for the mousepad and that unintentionally took off some of the coating, but it hasn't caused me any issues, just a cosmetic t hi ng.

description: The HP 17.3 inch Laptop PC blends a conscious design with performance and comfort. Get things done with peace of mind. The HP 17.3 inch Laptop PC is built with post-consumer recycled plastics. Multitasking feels easy and fast with the performance of an Intel Core processor, powerful graphics, and speedy Wi-Fi technology. See more on the 17.3 inch diagonal high resolution screen with a narrow bezel, and get comfy while you type with a new lift-hinge that elevates the keyboard. The HP 17.3 inch Laptop comes with a 45 W AC power adapter and goes from 0 to 50% charge in 45 minutes. Plus, it contains recycled materials and is EPEAT Gold and ENERGY STAR Certified. HP is here to help. This HP computer comes with 1-year limited hardware warranty and 90-days limited technical support for software and initial setup with 24-hour, 7 days a week web support when shipped from and sold by Amazon.com.

productPageReviews.reviewDescription: I generally liked this laptop and would have rated in the 3 - 4 star range.  There are not many options out there for a 17" screen laptop at reasonable prices and this one seemed like a good choice.  Unfortunately, it had a severe problem maintaining connectivity to my wifi network.  It seemed like on every click on a link to connect to a website, it failed to do so and I had to go through all the steps to re-establish connectivity.  I tried it for several days and spent hours hoping that the problem would subside.  I also tried turning off the power management feature that would turn off the wifi connection, switched between the private network - public network choices, and checked to make sure I had the latest driver for the chip.  Nothing worked.If you surf the net and even in the Amazon reviews for this model laptop, you will find that network connectivity is not a strong suit of HP.  I knew that before making the purchase.  I also saw that a significant majority of the reviews on this site for this laptop were positive.  So I decided to take a chance.  It did not work out for me.  I considered getting an identical replacement but, in the end, I bought another laptop from a different manufacturer.  The new laptop, being used in the same spot as the HP, has had no problems with wifi connectivity.In summary, the HP laptop seemed like a good machine and would have satisfied my requirements.  However, without consistent wifi connectivity it was totally unacceptable to me.
productPageReviews.reviewedIn: Reviewed in the United States on August 3, 2025

productPageReviews.reviewTitle: Great monitor but not the speakers
productPageReviews.reviewDescription: I've been watching this monitor on Amazon looking for a sale. Then one day it was priced $155.24. I couldn't believe it. I ordered it only to find it was not packaged in a Dell box. It was warranted by Amazon. Probably a return or something. I connected it up and it worked perfectly. Superb picture but the sound was rather tinny but definitely adequate, OK for voice but if you want quality sound there is a port on the monitor to connect your own powered speakers. The quality of the picture was what I wanted. I wanted sound but it wasn't important that it be high fidelity. I got a great deal and I'm very happy with it. I bought a HDMI 2.1 cable for it. It came with a cable for a laptop which I didn't use. It was super easy to assemble the stand and it is very stable. Easily adjusts to portrait position. Highly recommended.

description: Choose the ready-to-go Aspire 3 with the latest Ryzen™ 7000 Series Processors made for practical multitasking and productivity. With ease-of-use at its core, this family-friendly laptop is ready when you are. This Aspire 3 can tackle any job no matter how complex. Creativity soars to new heights with sharp, crisp visuals showcased on the 15.6" Full HD IPS screen, while the thin bezel provides you with more space to work with wherever inspiration strikes. It’s the perfect companion to take with you wherever you go With Windows 11 Home in S mode, you’ll experience fast start-ups, a familiar yet expanded Start menu, and great new ways to get stuff done. And with automatic updates enabled, you get all the latest features and security hassle-free. Work, play and share all in one device (NX.KJBAA.001).
features: Purposeful Design: Travel with ease and look great doing it with the Aspire's 3 thin, light design.
Ready-to-Go Performance: The Aspire 3 is ready-to-go with the latest AMD Ryzen 3 7320U Processor with Radeon Graphics—ideal for the entire family, with performance and productivity at the core.
Visibly Stunning: Experience sharp details and crisp colors on the 15.6" Full HD IPS display with 16:9 aspect ratio and narrow bezels.
Internal Specifications: 8GB LPDDR5 Onboard Memory; 128GB NVMe solid-state drive storage to store your files and media

The HD front-facing camera uses Acer’s TNR (Temporal Noise Reduction) technology for high-quality imagery in low-light conditions. Acer PurifiedVoice technology with AI Noise Reduction filters out any extra sound for clear communication over online meetings.
Wireless Wi-Fi 6 Convenience: Maintain a strong, consistent wireless signal with Wi-Fi 6 (aka 802.11ax) and 2x2 MU-MIMO technology.

Improved Thermals: With a 78% increase in fan surface area, enjoy an improved thermal system and an additional 17% thermal capacity. Allowing for longer, more efficient work sessions while not plugged in.

Ports For All Your Accessories: 1 - USB Type-C Port USB 3.2 Gen 2 (up to 10 Gbps) DisplayPort over USB Type-C & USB Charging, 2 - USB 3.2 Gen 1 Ports, 1 - HDMI 2.1 Port with HDCP support, 1 - Headphone/Speaker/Line-Out Jack, DC-in for AC adapter
What's In the Box: Acer Aspire Laptop, AC Adapter, Power Cord

From the manufacturer
Wireless Wi-Fi 6 Convenience

The functionality and speed receive mixed reviews - while some say it works well and starts up quickly, others report it stops working and takes a long time to turn on. The battery life and sound quality also get mixed feedback, with some praising the battery life while others report it doesn't hold a full charge, and many complain about the low volume and noisy cooling fan. The durability is concerning, with multiple customers reporting the left hinge breaking after 9 months of use.

productPageReviews.reviewDescription: This thing has run video games i didnt belive could be run with a laptop at this price point. Its kind of a monster, it runs everything i want it to and it's so fast and easy to work with and install stuff and yeah. For me, I use it to make music and then to play video games. I stream the games from my laptop (across the room on my desk) to my giant TV and use a big hard mouse pad while laying on my bed and its like. I feel like. These are the moments where you realize life is kinda awesome and you can totally play computer games whole laying down in bed and ok I sound lazy in this i get it, but actually,  no , I work 70 hours a week ok, sometimes 75, I worked 9:45 today so alright. You can judge me because I want to play idle miner with one hand while eating a snickers ice cream bar with the other. Its ok, I don't do it for anyone else but me.This product is good.
productPageReviews.reviewedIn: Reviewed in the United States on August 27, 2025

productPageReviews.reviewDescription: I got the upgraded Aspire 3 15 with touchscreen and updated AMD hardware with Ryzen 5 and Radeon graphics and 512GB SSD. I must say, I absolutely love this laptop. Now I know its not the fastest, thinnest, widest, longest lasting laptop in the world, but by god it comes close. I love how everything work on it, and the thing is its a great ALL AROUND COMPUTER! Good for business, family, games, etc.The only cons that I think it has is the light duty speakers that it comes with, i feel they dont get very loud; but keep in mind im actually partially Def  too so that probably doesnt help. And one other thing is the battery life. I feel the battery life won't win any awards for longest charge, but I do feel that it does pretty darn good i think it gets anywhere from 6 to 8 hours a charge depending on your settings and use. Keep in mind, I also have my battery limited to 70% currently to help preserve my battery life, and also with my needs i feel this lapto suites me quite well! Because it does everything I need it to do and lasts just long enough for any of my wireless traveling needs.Great all around laptop though, especially being that I got it for just over a decent $400 bucks!
productPageReviews.reviewedIn: Reviewed in the United States on July 17, 2025

productPageReviews.reviewDescription: Bought it for my gf for Christmas she had an older hp stream. Pretty big upgrade from that. She doesn't do anything to extensive. She plays Sims 4 on it and some other smaller game. It's a pretty snappy laptop. Not very heavy. Does get pretty hot underneath after a bit of use but definitely worth what u pay.
productPageReviews.reviewedIn: Reviewed in the United States on September 7, 2025

productPageReviews.reviewTitle: This is a great laptop for the price
productPageReviews.reviewDescription: I did some research a few laptops that weren't going to break the bank and this one had everything I wanted plus the reviews were alright. This was really easy to set up. After I signed into my Microsoft account it transferred all of my bookmarks over to this new laptop which was a real help. I just use the laptop to read blogs, write reviews, scroll social media and email. I don't play games or anything like that and so far, this laptop has been great. I've had it for 2 weeks and haven't had a problem at all.I run the laptop at home for about 7 hours a day. It is keeping cool, isn't lagging, is fast enough for me to do everything I need to, even when I have 20 tabs open.It only had 8GB of memory but that's what my old laptop had and it was enough for me. I do take pictures and download them to this laptop and there's more than enough storage to keep everything that I download. My old laptop lasted me 10 years and I never ran out of storage with the same amount of memory.
productPageReviews.reviewedIn: Reviewed in the United States on October 4, 2025

productPageReviews.reviewDescription: Bought this laptop last year and it works when it wants to, basically. I think maybe I must have gotten a faulty laptop, since the other reviews give this computer such high marks. That's fine but what's not fine is how Acer has handled this issue, repeatedly. It shouldn't take a year and some months to fix or at least accommodate your customers for a bad product. Chat support runs me in circles, e-mail support will just stop responding mid-way through investigation or conversation and never return, and calling the actual customer service line gets me nowhere. I had to pay money, actual money, to send in the laptop for repair and it came back with the same issues: Image burned into screen, webcam not working, touchscreen working intermittently. I told the man over the phone that it really did feel like they received the laptop, did a one-over, and sent it back without any true effort put into seeing if it functioned or not. I asked them for a partial refund--not even a full refund, because I still use the laptop and it still works in other areas: good battery life, good wifi-connection, etc. But no, they wanted me to pay money, again, to have it sent in again. They wanted me to send a video of the burned screen through e-mail as well. ...?? It just all felt shady and ridiculous. There was no e-mail for me to send it to, even though the guy told me he would e-mail me so I could reply with the video. Acer's inability to assist with something this simple is just laughable. I hate to be that person but this is the last time I'll ever deal with customer service that bad from this brand. If this is how they treat issues, then I'll avoid 'Acer' on any products from now on.
productPageReviews.reviewedIn: Reviewed in the United States on August 7, 2025

productPageReviews.reviewDescription: Really nice laptop. Was in the market for a new one. I use it for gaming and writing and I can be on it for hours and not feel it get hot at all. The screen quality is better than i expected for how cheep it was when I got it!
productPageReviews.reviewedIn: Reviewed in the United States on September 5, 2025

productPageReviews.reviewDescription: I am not sure where the negative comments come from. I purchased 2 of these laptops. My wife needed a new one also. I bought the R7 5825U Non-Touch screen. They were delivered quickly and safely. Both laptops powered on and went right to the update screen. Updated without issues. I took the time to remove/delete programs and apps that I will never use or were useless to me. I uploaded programs I do use without an issue, including LibreOffice. There was no blocking of the upload and the programs work as advertised. I am having no issues with fan noise/constant running. I hooked up to my WIFI easily and my DL/UL speeds are great.The laptops are very smooth running. They are quick and responsive.I would recommend these to anyone who wants a reasonable priced, every day, normal use computer.
productPageReviews.reviewedIn: Reviewed in the United States on September 1, 2025

productPageReviewsFromOtherCountries.reviewDescription: Tiene un rendimiento muy muy bueno, no se ha trabado para absolutamente nada, ahora quien se ha quedado lento es mi internet jaja, su calidad en todo sentido es excelente, lo que no me agrada del todo es su cargador, pero, sin duda es lo mejor para el precio, sobretodo aquí en México que para ese precio te ofrecen laptops con calidad horrible, de verdad que la volvería a encargar de nuevo, no se calienta, estéticamente es preciosa, su procesador es de lo mejores, la memoria sí que no es grande pero a la vez siento que está bien para que el procesador pueda rendir de la mejor manera, igual ya existen los discos duros, así que no hay pierde, si quieren algo de excelente calidad, estéticamente precioso y con un precio bajo, es la mejor opción ya que cuenta con prácticamente todo lo necesario casi para hacer cualquier cosa, no tuve tampoco ningún problema con el envío ni nada, la trajeron de Estados Unidos a México y todo muy bien (dato: la cámara también está preciosa cuando hay buena iluminación y el audio es muy bueno, no muy alto pero sí mucho mejor que el de mi laptop pasada sin duda).

productPageReviews.reviewDescription: I've only had this computer for a few days, but so far it does everything I need.  Right now I'm really only using it for taking online classes, so I don't have any idea how it would perform for games or streaming.  I like the look - very classy.  I'd rather it had either DVI or DisplayPort outputs, but I had to buy a monitor anyway, so I bought one with an HDMI output.  I like that it has 6 USB ports, but I don't like that 4 of them are in the front behind a flap.  I don't really like leaving things plugged in to the front, although it is more convenient for things that aren't plugged in very long, like charging phones or headphones, etc.  I'm not sure how much storage I'll need, but the 250GB SSD seems fine for now, and hard drives aren't too expensive so I can add one later if I need to.  As long as it doesn't take a dump on me I think I'll be pretty happy with it for the foreseeable future.
productPageReviews.reviewedIn: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2020

productPageReviews.reviewTitle: Boots up very fast, loads programs fast, I love it!
productPageReviews.reviewDescription: I needed a replacement for my aging desktop, and I already have a Lenovo tablet that I love, so I decided to go with this desktop. I needed a desktop with a solid state drive, that could do some medium-resolution image editing and light gaming (I play mostly older games). This desktop does everything I needed it to! It even runs some games that I didn't think it would be able to handle. It is also extremely quiet, and almost half the size of my old desktop. I love it!There are a few small downsides though. The solid state drive only has 256 GB of space. I wish it had more space. For now it's okay, it just means I can't install very many games at once. Also, it has 8 GB of RAM, but 2 GB are always reserved for the onboard graphics processor. So effectively it has 6 GB of system RAM. It is upgradable to 16 GB though, and I think I will be upgrading to that soon. I also wish it had more USB slots in the back. It has 2 in the back, and 4 on the front. I would have preferred it the other way around.Overall I am very happy with this desktop!
productPageReviews.reviewedIn: Reviewed in the United States on March 5, 2020

productPageReviews.reviewTitle: Terrible product and nightmare customer service
productPageReviews.reviewDescription: Really disappointing that I can't put 0 stars because honetsly to put 1 star and give them any sort of credit is TOO much.The product first arrived not working and after much trouble shooting, including buying new cables and a new monitor, they sent a replacement unit. A month later it begin freezing up every day multiple times a day with barely anything running. It says it's a gaming computer but it couldn't even handle photoshop and a couple tabs open.Short of typing out the whole entire story of the TERRIBLE, confusing and frustrating back and forth with customer service and the repair depot's, I'll just spare you all the details and let you know we were left with ALOT of wasted time, unanswered emails and had to send our tower off twice to finally get it back "working" after they tried to bill us for the parts. We had to buy a second tower because this was all taking SO LONG that our personal businesses were suffering.We tried VERY hard to pursue a refund because we never want to deal with this product or customer service ever again but they refuse to give us one since the tower is now supposedly fixed. They did tell us they will extend the warranty for 3 extra months so hopefully if it's gunna crap out again, it'll do it soon.DO NOT BUY THIS PRODUCT. DO NOT WATSE YOUR TIME AND MONEY. THIS COMPANY IS A JOKE.
productPageReviews.reviewedIn: Reviewed in the United States on April 23, 2021

productPageReviews.reviewTitle: Check those privacy settings, but overall a deal
productPageReviews.reviewDescription: It is good enough for most small businesses and the speed doesn't disappoint for a workstation.It doesn't have a video card so I wouldn't recommend it to graphic designers unless you know how to install a video card.Windows 10 pro comes with encryption which should keep everyone out but Microsoft.  The m.2 solid state drive is a great value in this package.It comes out of the box as a feasible workstation, with limited bloatware and windows 10's usual desire to make sure they can take all of your data and use it for whatever they want.  Outside of running windows 10 though, this machine is great.Most professional businesses still want to use windows 7 as the time spent keeping your machine from spying on you legally is borderline not worthwhile (a wonderful feature of windows 10).Still though, as long as you know what you're doing and double check the settings after every major update to protect yourself from microsoft and additionally aren't under constant virtual attack by competitors trying to steal your trade secrets, this is probably just fine for small to mid sized businesses outside of the tech fields.This also doesn't come with office, so keep that in mind, but other than your business' specific software which wouldn't come on it anyway, you probably won't need anything else.I'll lower the stars if I run into any major issues but as long as it keeps running for 4 or 5 years I'll be happy with my purchase.
productPageReviews.reviewedIn: Reviewed in the United States on December 13, 2019

productPageReviews.reviewTitle: Seems to be good PC....advertised incorrectly through the pictures...NOT HAPPY !
productPageReviews.reviewDescription: Seems to be an OK PC.  Pleased with everything except it was not built as advertised.  The photos of the back of the PC clearly show FOUR USB PORTS........after much work by a computer expert to set it up (software, etc), we discovered that there are only TWO USB PORTS on the back.  THIS IS A REAL ISSUE because I will either have to run the wires around to the front ports or I will have to purchase a Powered USB Hub........which I shouldn't have to do.Called LENOVO and they said it was not their problem.  Amazon says they will refund my money or exchange it.  I do not want to do that because of software issues and re-hiring an expert to set it up again.  Waiting on Circuit City now (who sold the item via Amazon) to return my phone call.  THIS IS ACCEPTABLE !!!
productPageReviews.reviewedIn: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2020

productPageReviews.reviewTitle: Review for 2020 MacBook Air (16GB RAM / 1TB / Space Gray)
productPageReviews.reviewDescription: I purchased this MacBook Air on August 15, 2025, and it arrived in excellent “premium” condition. For being a 5-year-old laptop, it’s still holding up incredibly well. I bought it as I was starting my freshman year of college and needed a powerful, reliable device.Previously, I was using a Dell Latitude E7440 from 2013, which was really showing its age—still running Windows 10 with poor audio quality, outdated graphics, and overall performance issues. Upgrading to this MacBook Air has been a huge step up in every way.The M1 chip may not be the newest anymore, but it runs beautifully for my needs. The only feature I wish this generation had is a touchscreen, but honestly, that’s a small tradeoff considering how much of an upgrade this has been.My only real complaint is that the screen tends to pick up everything—lint, dust, fingerprints, and smudges—but aside from that, I’ve been extremely happy with it. The build quality, performance, and overall premium Apple experience make this laptop well worth it.Key Points for Buyers:- Space Gray color was correct- Portability is on point with the 13-inch display size- Doesn't heat up like my older laptop, and doesn't have loud, noisy fans- 16GB RAM & 1TB SSD Storage- All the right USB ports!
productPageReviews.reviewedIn: Reviewed in the United States on September 1, 2025
productPageReviews.variant: Color: Space Gray, Capacity: 16GB - 1TB, Style: 8-core GPU

productPageReviews.reviewTitle: This is a fantastic laptop if you know what you're getting
productPageReviews.reviewDescription: This is one of the best laptops I can recommend. Its Great thats really all there is to say. I use this for mainly multi-media purposes. It is great at that. The M1 chip is a beast, needs no fans, and CAN do mild gaming.  It sounds good and the picture quality of the display is what you'd expect; very good. Obviously since it's a mac its easy to use, and made well as it is solid aluminum. A timeless design. Its got basically a 500gb SSD so its got decent storage and its fast, but I also use a samsung usb type c flash drive thing for most my media to not max it out instantly. I really do like the track pad too, I normally am very picky about them and don't like most very much at all. However I have always liked the mac ones, and this is not exception is as really responsive and a good size. I got mine for around $700 or so and I could not love it more. I have it for over a year and a half with no issues!FYI there is only 2 type c ports and 1 headphone jack on this laptop

productPageReviewsFromOtherCountries.reviewTitle: Detalle menor en % de bateria, pero se entiende, excelente producto!
productPageReviewsFromOtherCountries.reviewDescription: Lo compré para regalo, llego justo un día antes del que marcaba. Ya he tenido varias macbook y por experiencia puedo decir que esta en perfectas condiciones, me llegó sin rayones, la pantalla, bocinas, wifi, camara, todo funciona a la perfección, llego con MacOs sonoma 14.5 y la actualicé sin problemas, viene con un cargador generico de 65W, se agradece y se entiende ya que es un equipo reacondicionado, por lo general son los que la gente devuelve y al devolver a apple solo te reciben la laptop sin cargador, así que el hecho de incluir uno se agradece. En los comentarios vi que algunos usuarios les llego con mas del 90% de bateria, en mi caso llego con 87% y poco mas de 100 ciclos de carga, en México en iShop las venden nuevas de paquete sellado en menos de lo que me costó esta, sin embargo es al contado y preferí comprarla aquí a MSI. Lo menciono para quien la quiera comprar, quizá le convenga comprarla nueva. Fuera de eso todo excelente, muy contento!

productPageReviews.reviewTitle: A great deal on an awesome MacBook at a great price :)
productPageReviews.reviewDescription: Let me begin by saying I purchased this 128gb 8gb Memory 2020 M1 MacBook Air from MOBILESUPPLY, as Refurbished - Acceptable condition. Total purchase price was 358.00 after tax and shipping. I had placed the order late Wednesday Evening and received my MacBook Friday Afternoon, The seller overnighted my MacBook to me (Kudos to MOBILESUPPLY for the fast shipping). The MacBook I received is in almost near mint condition with only two very tiny nicks, and a small smudge on the lid of the MacBook. It did come with a generic charger but I have an extra Apple branded charger lying around so I use that instead.This thing is really fast and I love the convenience of the Apple ecosystem. It's so nice to answer calls, and read/write text messages all from my MacBook, not to mention how light the MacBook is. 128gb Storage is a little on the lower end of things, however I use an Samsung 1tb External SSD and that solves that problem. Be assured for regular use 8gb of system memory is more than enough to serve your needs. I bought Acceptable condition as a baseline knowing that I would at least receive a decent MacBook, but that there is a possibility of getting lucky and receiving a much better condition one. If you're on the fence about purchasing a refurbished MacBook just take the plunge and buy it. Lastly be sure to research and review your seller prior to purchasing. Thanks for your time in reading my review.
productPageReviews.reviewedIn: Reviewed in the United States on October 11, 2025
productPageReviews.variant: CPU: Apple M1 Chip, RAM Size: 8 GB, Capacity: 128GB, Style: Space Gray

productPageReviews.reviewTitle: Wow, M1 chip with 8gb RAM and 128gb storage is still such an upgrade from my Intel Mac.
productPageReviews.reviewDescription: I'm so pleased with this Macbook Air M1 with 8gb RAM and 128gb SSD. I was worried about buying refurbished and my budget is tight so I went with the "acceptable" condition. Also, I was worried 128gb would not be enough storage but my last computer was a 2015 Macbook Pro with the same amount of internal memory. So, I've learned to use SSDs and iCloud.It arrived in great condition! It is incredibly fast due to the M1 chip, looks so beautiful and battery life is 88%! It can last an entire day, 14 hours at work. Does not overheat. The screen looks amazing. It's far, far more than expected and it's helping the environment too! I'm much less stressed about using this computer which fits in my budget (about $350) than I would be buying a more expensive version. Makes me hesitate to buy new when there are refurbished gems like this one! Thank you, Mobilesupply!As long as you are good with managing storage, I find the 128gb to be enough! Please make sure to check how much storage you are currently using prior to purchasing. Also, I received a non-OEM charger that didn't work so be aware of this as a possibility. The company gave me a small courtesy credit to buy a new one. Of course I wish it came with original Apple charger but still five stars!

productPageReviews.reviewTitle: Dropped computers shouldn’t be sold as in “excellent” conditions
productPageReviews.reviewDescription: I bought the “excellent” conditions refurbished macbook air m1. Upon arrival and inspection i notice that it has a bent in the back corner, obviously from a drop to the ground. This bend makes the screen not to be flushed when closing the laptop. So in my opinion it shouldnt be considered as an “excellent” conditions as drops with that force could have damaged something internally. Besides that the screen looks good and the scratches on the outside are not too bad, and the laptop seems to work fine. Battery is at 92% which is good. Will keep using the laptop as i need a computer right now. Will update if i notice anything else. Fast shipping.

productPageReviews.reviewDescription: I recently purchased the Samsung 14" Galaxy Chromebook and couldn’t be happier with my decision. As someone who isn’t very tech-savvy, I found this Chromebook incredibly simple to use right out of the box. The setup was straightforward, and navigating through apps and tasks is a breeze.One of the things I love most is how lightweight it is — perfect for travel or just carrying around the house. Whether I’m using it on the go or packing it in my bag for a trip, it doesn’t feel bulky at all.It’s also nicely priced for everything it offers. You get a sleek design, solid performance, and great portability without spending a fortune. If you're looking for something easy to use and dependable, I highly recommend the Samsung Galaxy Chromebook.

productPageReviews.reviewDescription: This thing was bad order right out of the box. The peek a boo scroll bars don't work. Seems its systemic in Chrome Books. There a all type of suggestions on how to fix it on line yet none work. While trying to use a the scroll function you constantly get sent to another web site. This hidden scroll bar design leave you hunting for the bar more than the time you getting work done. After 6 hrs of searching, yet not finding the bars, for the most part, I packed it up and shipped it back. Seems this is a major flaw on Chrome Books new OS from what I've read on the internet. What were they thinking?

items.text:
About Us 
Auusda is a rising star in the laptop market, offering a range of affordable yet powerful devices designed to meet the needs of professionals, students, and casual users alike. Known for its cost-effective solutions and solid performance, Auusda laptops are equipped with modern features and reliable hardware, making them an excellent choice for everyday computing tasks.

productPageReviews.reviewTitle: Perfect Everyday Laptop for Web and Email Use
productPageReviews.reviewDescription: I purchased this laptop for a family member who mainly uses it for web surfing and emails, and they absolutely love it! It’s fast, reliable, and handles everyday tasks with ease. Pages load quickly, switching between apps is smooth, and Windows 11 runs without any hiccups.The build quality is ok, the full HD display looks great, and the backlit keyboard and fingerprint reader are nice premium touches you don’t usually get at this price. The 16GB of RAM and 1TB NVMe SSD make everything feel snappy, and WiFi/Bluetooth connectivity has been reliable.I wouldn’t recommend this for gaming or heavy video editing, but for browsing, emails, streaming, and basic productivity, it’s perfect — especially considering the value for the price. My family member has nothing but praise for it.✅ Pros:Fast performance for everyday tasksGreat value for the specsFHD display, backlit keyboard, and fingerprint readerPlenty of storage (1TB SSD)Reliable for web and email use❌ Cons:Not ideal for gaming or intensive workloadsOverall, if you need an affordable, dependable laptop for everyday use, this is a great buy!
productPageReviews.reviewedIn: Reviewed in the United States on October 5, 2025

productPageReviews.reviewDescription: Very nice value laptop. It provides a great alternative if you're not looking for anything fancy or expensive. It gets the job done and it looks amazing. It's pretty fast too. I haven't tried using it for gaming but that's not why I bought it so I wouldn't know. Wi-Fi connection is strong and there is no touch screen.
productPageReviews.reviewedIn: Reviewed in the United States on October 7, 2025

productPageReviews.reviewDescription: I recently purchased the Auusda T152A laptop, and overall, I’m impressed for the price. The Intel N95 processor, paired with 16GB RAM and a 512GB SSD, handles multitasking and everyday tasks smoothly. The 15.6” Full HD IPS screen delivers vibrant colors and wide viewing angles, making it great for work and entertainment. I also appreciate the sleek design, backlit keyboard, and fingerprint reader for added convenience. Battery life is decent but not exceptional, and the mostly plastic build feels a bit flimsy compared to higher-end laptops. Overall, it’s a solid, budget-friendly choice for students, professionals, or anyone looking for reliable everyday performance.
productPageReviews.reviewedIn: Reviewed in the United States on October 11, 2025

productPageReviews.reviewTitle: Verified purchase, GREAT BANG FOR BUCK, HOWEVER...
productPageReviews.reviewDescription: Bought as Prime day item.  Great graphics, superb storage, backlit keyboard appreciated, seamless Bluetooth.  All in all excellent value for the package compared to other name brands.  Also very good design and easy on the eye.  However, could do with a couple more USB ports and the audio would have been excellent if the speakers worked correctly, then disappeared entirely, could only use Bluetooth.  Unable to reinstall from download.  Had an IT guy investigate and deemed a hardware failure.  Vendor offered a replacement, which I acccepted, shipping label supplied.  The customer support was excellent, timely response (by email) and always professional and courteous.  I asked for a modest upgrade because of the inconvenience, but allegedly was out 6f stock on next model up.  They did offer a reasonable discount, some vendors don't.  Awaiting replacement, I hope it lives up to the potential this item is fully capable of.  If audio had function properly would easily have been 5 stars.
productPageReviews.reviewedIn: Reviewed in the United States on July 16, 2025

productPageReviews.reviewDescription: This computer is fast and easy to use and is more than adequate for my needs.  It has good Battery life and charges fairly quickly.  My only concern is that it does tend to warm up a bit so it is important to use it in a place where the fan can get adequate ventilation. Great personal computer.
productPageReviews.reviewedIn: Reviewed in the United States on October 5, 2025

productPageReviews.reviewDescription: The 15.6” Laptop Computer Notebook is an excellent choice for anyone needing a reliable and affordable computer. The screen is perfect and clear, making work, streaming, and browsing enjoyable. It runs fast and handles everyday tasks with ease, and the full-size keyboard is comfortable for long use. Lightweight, dependable, and stylish this laptop is a fantastic value and feels like it should cost more than it does.
productPageReviews.reviewedIn: Reviewed in the United States on October 10, 2025

productPageReviews.reviewTitle: It’s not the best but works
productPageReviews.reviewDescription: Overall the laptop is a decent pick for a smaller budget and the specs that it has are great but the specs it lists don’t make up the computer entirely. First off this laptop heats up very rapidly because of its processor being so cheap and the 16 gb of ram doesn’t make up for the processor either still making it slow for things on a higher end but still great for basic office work but do be aware of the battery life only being 2 hours and bumped up to about 2 hours and 30 minutes with all its battery saving effects on and due to that make sure you are close to a power outlet whenever you use this since it dies fast.
productPageReviews.reviewedIn: Reviewed in the United States on July 20, 2025

productPageReviewsFromOtherCountries.reviewDescription: I travel weekly for work, and this laptop has become my favorite travel buddy. Weighing just 3.7 LBS and as thin as a notebook, it slides easily into my backpack without adding bulk. The durable quality withstood a few accidental knocks, and the compact design fits perfectly on airplane tray tables. No more lugging around heavy gear.
